ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE

block.text: LUKE

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE 1
Many have undertaken to set in order a narrative concerning those matters which have been fulfilled among us,
just as they were handed down to us by those who were eyewitnesses and servants of the word from the beginning.

block.text: Bikman Tiofilus, bipo planti man i traim han bilong ol long raitim stori bilong olgeta samting God i bin mekim i kamap namel long mipela.

Ol i bihainim tok bilong ol man i bin lukim ol dispela samting long ai bilong ol, stat long taim ol dispela samting i bin kirap. Ol dispela man i stap olsem wokman bilong tok bilong God, na ol i givim dispela stori long mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore, it seemed good to me also, having carefully investigated from the beginning, to write for you an orderly account, most excellent Theophilus.

block.text: Olsem na mi tu mi laik raitim dispela stori na salim i kam long yu. Mi bin wok longpela taim long askim gut long as bilong dispela olgeta samting. Nau mi raitim stret tasol, olsem ol dispela samting i bin kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This way, you can be sure you know the truth about the things you have been taught.

block.text: Yu ritim na bai yu ken save gut olsem, dispela tok ol i bin lainim yu long en, em i tru olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There was in the days of Herod, the king of Judea, a certain priest named Zechariah, of the priestly division of Abijah. He had a wife of the daughters of Aaron, and her name was Elizabeth.

block.text: Taim Herot i stap king bilong Judia, wanpela pris i stap, nem bilong en Sekaraia. Em i pris bilong ol lain bilong Abiya. Meri bilong en em i bilong lain bilong Aron, na nem bilong meri em Elisabet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were both righteous before God, walking blamelessly in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord.

block.text: Tupela i stap stretpela long ai bilong God. Tupela i save bihainim olgeta lo na olgeta tok bilong Bikpela, na tupela i no gat asua long ai bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they had no child, because Elizabeth was barren, and they both were well advanced in years.

block.text: Tasol tupela i no gat pikinini, long wanem, Elisabet i no inap karim pikinini. Na tupela i lapun pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One day Zechariah’s division was on duty and he was serving as priest before God.

block.text: Wanpela taim ol lain bilong Sekaraia i go mekim wok pris, na Sekaraia tu i mekim wok pris long ai bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: According to the custom of the priests, he was chosen by lot to go into the temple of the Lord and burn incense.

block.text: Orait ol i pilai satu bilong painimaut wanem pris i mas go insait long haus bilong Bikpela, bilong mekim ofa bilong smok i gat gutpela smel. Na long dispela pasin ol i makim Sekaraia, na em i go insait bilong mekim ofa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The whole multitude of the people was praying outside at the hour of incense.

block.text: Long dispela taim bilong mekim ofa, ol bikpela lain manmeri i bung i stap ausait long haus bilong God na ol i beten i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: An angel of the Lord appeared to him, standing on the right side of the altar of incense.

block.text: Orait na wanpela ensel bilong Bikpela i kamap long Sekaraia na i sanap i stap long han sut bilong alta bilong ofa bilong smok i gat gutpela smel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Zechariah was troubled when he saw him, and fear fell upon him.
But the angel said to him,

block.text: Sekaraia i lukim ensel na em i kirap nogut na i pret.
Tasol ensel i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t be afraid, Zechariah, because your request has been heard, and your wife, Elizabeth, will bear you a son, and you shall call his name John.

block.text: "Sekaraia, yu no ken pret. God i harim pinis prea bilong yu. Meri bilong yu Elisabet bai i karim pikinini man. Na yu mas kolim nem bilong en Jon.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will have joy and gladness; and many will rejoice at his birth.

block.text: Bai bel bilong yu i stap gutpela, na bai yu amamas. Na planti manmeri bai i amamas long taim dispela pikinini i kamap,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he will be great in the sight of the Lord, and he will drink no wine nor strong drink. He will be filled with the Holy Spirit, even from his mother’s womb.

block.text: long wanem, em bai i gat biknem long ai bilong Bikpela. Em bai i no ken dring wain na bia samting. Taim em i stap yet long bel bilong mama, Holi Spirit bai i pulap long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will turn many of the children of Israel to the Lord, their God.

block.text: Em bai i mekim planti manmeri bilong Israel i tanim na i go long God, Bikpela bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will go before him in the spirit and power of Elijah, ‘to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children,’ and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just; to prepare a people prepared for the Lord.”

block.text: Em bai i kisim pasin na strong bilong Elaija na wokabaut i go pas long Bikpela. Em bai i mekim ol papa na ol pikinini i kamap wanbel. Na em bai i stretim tingting bilong ol man bilong sakim tok, na ol bai i kisim gutpela tingting olsem bilong ol stretpela man. Em bai i redim ol man na ol i stap redi long Bikpela i kam."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Zechariah said to the angel,

block.text: Na Sekaraia i tokim ensel olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How can I be sure of this? For I am an old man, and my wife is well advanced in years.”

block.text: "Olsem wanem na mi ken save dispela tok bilong yu i tru? Mi lapun pinis, na meri bilong mi em tu i lapun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel answered him,

block.text: Na ensel i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am Gabriel, who stands in the presence of God. I was sent to speak to you, and to bring you this good news.

block.text: "Mi Gebriel, na mi save sanap long pes bilong God. God yet i salim mi na mi kam bilong tokim yu, na bilong bringim dispela gutpela nius long yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, you will be silent and not able to speak, until the day that these things will happen, because you didn’t believe my words, which will be fulfilled in their proper time.”

block.text: Orait yu harim. Yu no bin bilipim tok bilong mi, olsem na nau maus bilong yu bai i pas na bai yu no inap toktok, inap long taim dispela olgeta samting i kamap pinis. Dispela tok bilong mi bai i kamap tru long taim God i makim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The people were waiting for Zechariah, and they marveled that he delayed in the temple.

block.text: Ol manmeri i wet yet long Sekaraia, na ol i tingting planti long wanem samting i kamap na em i stap longpela taim insait long haus bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he came out, he could not speak to them, and they said:

block.text: Na bihain em i kam ausait na em i no inap mekim toktok long ol. Olsem na ol i save,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He has seen a vision in the temple!”

block.text: em i bin lukim narakain samting insait long haus bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He continued making hand signs to them, and remained mute.

block.text: Em i mekim toktok long ol long han bilong en tasol. Na maus bilong en i pas i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, when the days of his service were fulfilled, he departed to his house.

block.text: Bihain, taim bilong wok bilong Sekaraia em i pinis, na em i go bek long ples bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: After these days Elizabeth, his wife, conceived, and she hid herself five months, saying,

block.text: Na bihain meri bilong en Elisabet em i gat bel. Na em i hait i stap inap long 5 -pela mun. Elisabet i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Thus has the Lord done to me in the days in which he looked at me, to take away my reproach among men.”

block.text: "Bikpela i bin marimari long mi. Em i mekim dispela samting i kamap long mi bilong pinisim sem bilong mi long ai bilong ol manmeri."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now in the sixth month, the angel Gabriel was sent from God to a city of Galilee, called Nazareth.

block.text: Long namba 6 mun bilong Elisabet i gat bel, God i salim ensel Gebriel i go long wanpela taun bilong Galili, nem bilong en Nasaret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went to a virgin who was pledged to be married to a man named Joseph, of the house of David. The virgin’s name was Mary.

block.text: Em i go long wanpela yangpela meri ol i bin makim bilong maritim wanpela man bilong lain bilong King Devit, nem bilong en Josep. Nem bilong dispela yangpela meri em Maria.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Having come in, the angel said to her,

block.text: Orait Gebriel i go long em na i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rejoice, you highly favored one! The Lord is with you. Blessed are you among women!”

block.text: "Gude, meri. Bikpela i stap wantaim yu, na em i bin blesim yu na mekim gut long yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when she saw him, she was greatly troubled at the saying, and considered what kind of salutation this might be.
The angel said to her,

block.text: Maria i harim dispela tok, na em i kirap nogut na i ting, "Dispela em i wanem kain tok?"
Na ensel i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t be afraid, Mary, for you have found favor with God.

block.text: "Maria, yu no ken pret. God em i belgut tru long yu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, you will conceive in your womb, and bring forth a son, and will call his name ‘Jesus.’

block.text: Harim. Yu bai kisim bel na karim wanpela pikinini man. Na yu mas kolim nem bilong en Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will be great, and will be called the Son of the Most High. The Lord God will give him the throne of his father, David.

block.text: Em bai i stap bikman. Na bai ol i kolim em Pikinini bilong God Antap Tru. Na God bai i putim em i stap king olsem tumbuna bilong en Devit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will reign over the house of Jacob forever. There will be no end to his Kingdom.”

block.text: Em bai i stap king bilong ol lain bilong Jekop oltaim. Na wok king bilong en bai i no inap pinis."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary said to the angel,

block.text: Na Maria i askim ensel olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “How can this be, since I am a virgin?”

block.text: "Dispela samting bai i kamap olsem wanem? Mi no marit yet long wanpela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel answered her,

block.text: Na ensel i bekim tok bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Holy Spirit will come on you, and the power of the Most High will overshadow you. Therefore also the holy one who is born from you will be called the Son of God.

block.text: "Holi Spirit bai i kam long yu, na strong bilong God Antap Tru bai i karamapim yu. Olsem na dispela pikinini bihain bai yu karim, em bai i stap gutpela na stretpela man bilong God, na ol bai i kolim em Pikinini Bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, Elizabeth, your relative, also has conceived a son in her old age; and this is the sixth month with her who was called barren.

block.text: "Harim. Kandere bilong yu Elisabet em i lapun pinis, tasol emi gat bel na em bai i karim pikinini man. Bipo ol i save tok em i no inap karim pikinini. Tasol nau em i gat bel, na 6 -pela mun bilong en i go pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For everything spoken by God is possible.”

block.text: I no gat wanpela samting God i no inap mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary said,

block.text: Na Maria i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, I am the handmaid of the Lord; be it done to me according to your word.”

block.text: "Harim. Mi wokmeri bilong Bikpela. Em i ken mekim long mi olsem yu tok."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel departed from her.

block.text: Orait ensel i lusim em na i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary arose in those days and went into the hill country with haste, into a city of Judah.

block.text: Long dispela taim Maria i kirap na i hariap i go long ples maunten, long wanpela taun bilong distrik Judia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She entered into the house of Zechariah and greeted Elizabeth.

block.text: Na em i go insait long haus bilong Sekaraia na i givim gude long Elisabet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, when Elizabeth heard Mary’s greeting, that the baby leaped in her womb, and Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit.

block.text: Elisabet i harim gude bilong Maria, na pikinini i stap long bel bilong Elisabet em i kalap. Na Holi Spirit i pulap long Elisabet,

ReferenceBlocks.text: She called out with a loud voice, and said,

block.text: na em i singaut strong tumas, na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Blessed are you among women, and blessed is the fruit of your womb!

block.text: "God i bin mekim gut tru long yu na givim yu blesing i winim blesing em i givim long ol arapela meri. Na dispela pikinini i stap long bel bilong yu, em tu i kisim blesing bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Why am I so favored, that the mother of my Lord should come to me?

block.text: Mi husat na mama bilong Bikpela bilong mi em i kam long mi?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For behold, when the voice of your greeting came into my ears, the baby in my womb leaped for joy!

block.text: Harim. Taim yau bilong mi i harim gude bilong yu, orait pikinini i stap long bel bilong mi em i amamas na i kalap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed is she who believed, for there will be a fulfillment of the things which have been spoken to her from the Lord!”

block.text: Yu bin bilip olsem Bikpela bai i mekim olsem em i bin tokim yu, olsem na yu ken amamas tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary said,

block.text: Maria i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “My soul magnifies the Lord.
My spirit has rejoiced in God my Savior.

block.text: "Bel bilong mi em i litimapim nem bilong Bikpela.
Na spirit bilong mi em i amamas long God, em i Helpim bilong mi na em i save mekim mi i stap gut tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has looked at the humble state of his handmaid. For behold, from now on, all generations will call me blessed.

block.text: Mi wokmeri bilong en, mi samting nating, tasol em i lukim mi na em i marimari long mi. Nau na bihain tu bai olgeta lain manmeri i tok long God i bin givim bikpela amamas long mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he who is mighty has done great things for me. Holy is his name.

block.text: God i gat bikpela strong, em i bin mekim narakain samting tru bilong helpim mi, na nem bilong en i stap holi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His mercy is for generations of generations on those who fear him.

block.text: Em i save marimari long ol manmeri i aninit long em. Em bai i mekim olsem tasol long ol manmeri i stap nau, na long ol manmeri i kamap bihain inap oltaim oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has shown strength with his arm. He has scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts.

block.text: Han bilong en i bin mekim strongpela wok. Ol man i save ting ol i nambawan tru na i litimapim nem bilong ol yet, em i bin rausim ol i go nabaut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has put down princes from their thrones. And has exalted the lowly.

block.text: Em i daunim ol strongpela king, na em i litimapim ol man i no gat nem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has filled the hungry with good things. He has sent the rich away empty.

block.text: Em i givim planti gutpela samting long ol man i hangre, na bel bilong ol i pulap tru. Tasol ol man i gat planti samting, em i rausim ol i go nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has given help to Israel, his servant, in remembrance of his mercy,
as he spoke to our fathers, to Abraham and to his offspring forever.”

block.text: Em i helpim wokman bilong en, Israel, na em i tingim yet promis em i bin mekim long Abraham na long ol tumbuna bilong yumi, long em bai i marimari oltaim long ol lain bilong ol i kamap bihain."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Mary stayed with her about three months, and then returned to her house.

block.text: Maria i stap wantaim Elisabet inap tripela mun samting, na bihain em i go bek long ples bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the time that Elizabeth should give birth was fulfilled, and she brought forth a son.

block.text: Taim i kamap bilong Elisabet i karim pikinini, na em i karim pikinini man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Her neighbors and her relatives heard that the Lord had magnified his mercy towards her, and they rejoiced with her.

block.text: Ol wanples na ol wanlain bilong Elisabet ol i harim nius long Bikpela i bin marimari tru long em, na ol i amamas wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened on the eighth day, that they came to circumcise the child; and they would have called him Zechariah, after the name of the father.
His mother answered,

block.text: Long de namba 8 ol i kam bilong katim skin bilong pikinini. Ol i laik givim nem Sekaraia long em, olsem nem bilong papa.
Tasol mama bilong pikinini i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Not so; but he will be called John.”

block.text: "Nogat. Yumi mas kolim nem bilong en Jon."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to her,

block.text: Na ol i tokim em,

block.characterId: neighbors and relatives of Elizabeth and Zacharias (Zechariah)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: neighbors and relatives of Elizabeth and Zacharias (Zechariah)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “There is no one among your relatives who is called by this name.”

block.text: "I no gat wanpela bilong ol wanlain bilong yupela i gat dispela nem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They made signs to his father, asking:

block.text: Na ol i mekim toktok long han, na ol i askim papa,

block.characterId: neighbors and relatives of Elizabeth and Zacharias (Zechariah)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: neighbors and relatives of Elizabeth and Zacharias (Zechariah)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “What is his name?”

block.text: em i laik givim wanem nem long pikinini.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He asked for a writing tablet, and wrote, “His name is John.” They all marveled.

block.text: Em i tokim ol long bringim wanpela samting bilong em i ken raitim tok long en, na em i raitim tok olsem, "Nem bilong en Jon." Na ol i tingting planti.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His mouth was opened immediately, and his tongue freed, and he spoke, saying:

block.text: Na wantu tasol maus bilong Sekaraia i no pas moa, na em inap toktok gen. Orait na em i toktok, na i

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Praise God!”

block.text: litimapim nem bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Fear came on all who lived around them, and all these sayings were talked about throughout all the hill country of Judea.

block.text: Na olgeta wanples bilong em, ol i lukim dispela narakain samting i bin kamap na ol i pret. Na nius bilong dispela olgeta samting i go nabaut long olgeta ples i stap long ples maunten bilong Judia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who heard them laid them up in their heart, saying,

block.text: Olgeta man i harim dispela nius, ol i tingting planti na ol i askim olsem,

block.characterId: everyone in Judean hills who heard

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: everyone in Judean hills who heard
ReferenceBlocks.text: “What then will this child be?”

block.text: "Bihain dispela pikinini bai i kamap wanem kain man?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The hand of the Lord was with him.

block.text: Ol i save, strong bilong Bikpela i stap wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His father, Zechariah, was filled with the Holy Spirit, and prophesied, saying,

block.text: Orait Holi Spirit i pulap long Sekaraia, papa bilong dispela pikinini, na em i mekim tok profet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Blessed be the Lord, the God of Israel, for he has visited and worked redemption for his people;

block.text: "Yumi litimapim nem bilong God, Bikpela bilong Israel. Em i kam na i helpim yumi manmeri bilong en, na em i kisim bek yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and has raised up a horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David.

block.text: Long lain bilong wokboi bilong en Devit, Bikpela i kamapim wanpela strongpela man bilong kisim bek yumi,

ReferenceBlocks.text: (He spoke this long ago by the mouth of his holy prophets):

block.text: olsem bipo yet em i bin tok long maus bilong ol profet bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That we should have salvation from our enemies, and from the hand of all who hate us;

block.text: Em i tok bai em i kisim bek yumi long han bilong ol birua bilong yumi, na long han bilong ol man i bel nogut tru long yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: to show mercy towards our fathers, to remember his holy covenant;

block.text: Em i marimari long ol tumbuna bilong yumi na i helpim ol. Na em i tingim yet dispela kontrak bipo em yet i mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the oath which he spoke to Abraham, our father,
to grant to us that we, being delivered out of the hand of our enemies, should serve him without fear,
In holiness and righteousness before him all the days of our life.

block.text: Em i tok tru antap long tumbuna bilong yumi Abraham. Na nau em i laik mekim long yumi olsem bipo em i tok.
Em i laik kisim bek yumi long han bilong ol birua, na yumi ken holim wok bilong em, na yumi no ken pret.
Olsem na olgeta taim yumi stap laip, yumi ken wokabaut long ol pasin i stret long ai bilong em, na yumi ken pulap long ol gutpela gutpela pasin em i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And you, child, will be called a prophet of the Most High, for you will go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways.

block.text: Na yu, pikinini, bihain bai ol i kolim yu profet bilong God Antap Tru. Bai yu go pas long Bikpela, bilong redim rot bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You will give knowledge of salvation to his people by the remission of their sins.

block.text: You will give knowledge of salvation to his people by the remission of their sins.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, our God is full of tenderness and kindness. He shines a light on us from above, like the rising sun.

block.text: Yes, our God is full of tenderness and kindness. He shines a light on us from above, like the rising sun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It will enlighten those who live in the darkness and the shadow of death. It will guide our steps along the road of peace.”

block.text: It will enlighten those who live in the darkness and the shadow of death. It will guide our steps along the road of peace.”

ReferenceBlocks.text: The child was growing, and becoming strong in spirit, and was in the desert until the day of his public appearance to Israel.

block.text: Bihain dispela pikinini i kamap bikpela, na spirit bilong en i kamap strong. Em i go i stap long ples i no gat man, inap long taim em i kamap ples klia long ai bilong ol Israel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE 2
Now it happened in those days, that a decree went out from Caesar Augustus that all the world should be enrolled.

block.text: Long dispela taim Sisar Ogastus i putim wanpela lo long ol i mas kisim nem bilong olgeta manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This was the first enrollment made when Quirinius was governor of Syria.

block.text: Dispela em i namba wan taim gavman i kisim nem bilong ol, na long dispela taim Kwirinius i stap namba wan gavman bilong provins Siria.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All went to enroll themselves, everyone to his own city.

block.text: Olsem na olgeta manmeri i go long as ples bilong ol, bai gavman i ken kisim nem bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Joseph also went up from Galilee, out of the city of Nazareth, into Judea, to the city of David, which is called Bethlehem, because he was of the house and family of David.

block.text: Josep em i bilong lain famili bilong King Devit. Olsem na em i lusim taun Nasaret long Galili, na em i go long Judia long taun bilong Devit, ol i kolim Betlehem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went to be registered with Mary, who was pledged to be married to him as wife, and was expecting a child.

block.text: Em i go wantaim meri bilong en Maria, bai gavman i ken kisim nem bilong tupela. Na long dispela taim Maria i gat bel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, while they were there, that the day had come that she should give birth.

block.text: Tupela i stap yet long Betlehem, na taim i kamap bilong Maria i karim pikinini.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She brought forth her firstborn son, and she wrapped him in bands of cloth, and laid him in a feeding trough, because there was no room for them in the inn.

block.text: Na em i karim namba wan pikinini man bilong en. Na em i karamapim em long laplap, na i slipim em insait long bokis kaikai bilong ol bulmakau, long wanem, haus pasindia em i pulap pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There were shepherds in the same country staying in the field, and keeping watch by night over their flock.

block.text: Long dispela hap sampela wasman bilong sipsip i stap ausait long taun, na ol i was long ol sipsip bilong ol long nait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, an angel of the Lord stood by them, and the glory of the Lord shone around them, and they were terrified.
The angel said to them,

block.text: Na ensel bilong Bikpela i kam long ol, na Bikpela i mekim bikpela lait bilong en i kamap raun long ol, na ol i pret tru.
Tasol ensel i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t be afraid, for behold, I bring you good news of great joy which will be to all the people.

block.text: "Yupela i no ken pret. Harim. Mi bringim gutnius i kam long yupela, em nius bilong mekim olgeta manmeri i amamas tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For there is born to you, this day, in the city of David, a Savior, who is Christ the Lord.

block.text: Long dispela de long taun bilong Devit, wanpela meri i karim pikinini. Na dispela pikinini bai i kisim bek yupela olgeta. Em i Bikpela, na em i man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This is the sign to you: you will find a baby wrapped in strips of cloth, lying in a feeding trough.”

block.text: Na yupela i ken luksave long em olsem. Yupela bai i lukim wanpela pikinini ol i pasim em long laplap, na em i slip i stap long bokis kaikai bilong bulmakau."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Suddenly, there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly army praising God, and saying,

block.text: Ensel i tok pinis, orait wantu planti ensel moa bilong ami bilong heven i kamap na i stap wantaim dispela ensel. Na ol i litimapim nem bilong God olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Glory to God in the highest, on earth peace, good will toward men.”

block.text: "Litimapim nem bilong God i save stap antap tru. Na long graun ol manmeri i ken stap bel isi. God i belgut long ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, when the angels went away from them into the sky, that the shepherds said one to another,

block.text: Ol ensel i lusim ol na i go bek pinis long heven, orait ol wasman bilong sipsip i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Let’s go to Bethlehem, now, and see this thing that has happened, which the Lord has made known to us.”

block.text: "Goan, yumi go long Betlehem na yumi lukim dispela samting i kamap, em Bikpela i bin tokim yumi long en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They came with haste, and found both Mary and Joseph, and the baby was lying in the feeding trough.

block.text: Orait na ol i go hariap, na ol i lukim Maria tupela Josep i stap, na pikinini i slip i stap long bokis kaikai bilong bulmakau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they saw it, they publicized widely the saying which was spoken to them about this child.

block.text: Ol i lukim pinis, na ol i autim tok long ol samting ensel i bin tokim ol long dispela pikinini.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who heard it wondered at the things which were spoken to them by the shepherds.

block.text: Na olgeta man i harim dispela tok ol wasman bilong sipsip i mekim, ol i tingting planti long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Mary kept all these sayings, pondering them in her heart.

block.text: Tasol Maria i putim dispela olgeta tok long bel bilong en, na em i tingim i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen, just as it was told them.

block.text: Na ol wasman bilong sipsip i go bek na ol i wok long litimapim nem bilong God. Ol i amamas long God long olgeta samting ol i bin harim na lukim. Ol samting i bin kamap olsem ensel i bin tokim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When eight days were fulfilled for the circumcision of the child, his name was called Jesus, which was given by the angel before he was conceived in the womb.

block.text: Wanpela wik bihain long mama i karim pikinini, ol i katim skin bilong en, na ol i kolim nem bilong en Jisas. Em i no kamap yet long bel bilong mama, na ensel i kolim pinis dispela nem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were fulfilled, they brought him up to Jerusalem, to present him to the Lord
(as it is written in the law of the Lord,

block.text: Taim i kamap pinis bilong Josep wantaim Maria i bihainim pasin bilong kamap klin long ai bilong God olsem lo bilong Moses i tok, orait tupela i kisim pikinini i go long Jerusalem bilong givim em long Bikpela.
Tupela i laik bihainim tok i stap long lo bilong Bikpela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Every male who opens the womb shall be called holy to the Lord”),

block.text: "Ol namba wan pikinini man mama i karim, ol dispela yupela i mas givim long Bikpela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: and to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord,

block.text: Tupela i bringim tu ol pisin bilong mekim ofa, olsem lo bilong Bikpela i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “A pair of turtledoves, or two young pigeons.”

block.text: "Tupela namba wan balus, o tupela yangpela namba 2 balus."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, there was a man in Jerusalem whose name was Simeon. This man was righteous and devout, looking for the consolation of Israel, and the Holy Spirit was on him.

block.text: Long dispela taim i gat wanpela man i stap long Jerusalem, nem bilong en Simeon. Em i man bilong mekim stretpela pasin na em i man bilong lotu long God. Em i wetim dispela man God i bin makim bilong mekim gut bel bilong ol Israel. Na Holi Spirit i stap long Simeon.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It had been revealed to him by the Holy Spirit that he should not see death before he had seen the Lord’s Christ.

block.text: Holi Spirit i tokim em pinis olsem, em bai i no inap i dai kwik. Nogat. Pastaim em i mas lukim dispela man Bikpela i bin promis long salim i kam bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came in the Spirit into the temple. When the parents brought in the child, Jesus, that they might do concerning him according to the custom of the law.

block.text: Orait Holi Spirit i kirapim em na em i go insait long tempel. Na papamama i bringim pikinini Jisas i kam bilong mekim pasin long em olsem lo i tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he received him into his arms, and blessed God, and said,

block.text: Na Simeon i kisim em na i holim em. Na Simeon i litimapim nem bilong God olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now you are releasing your servant, Master, according to your word, in peace.

block.text: "Bikpela, mi wokboi bilong yu, na nau yu ken larim mi i go, na bel bilong mi i ken i stap isi, olsem bipo yu tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For my eyes have seen your salvation,
which you have prepared before the face of all peoples;

block.text: Ai bilong mi i lukim pinis samting yu mekim bilong kisim bek mipela.
Yu bin redim dispela long ai bilong olgeta lain manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: a light for revelation to the nations, and the glory of your people Israel.”

block.text: Em i wanpela lait, na em bai i givim lait long ol man bilong ol arapela lain, na em bai i givim biknem long ol Israel, em ol lain manmeri bilong yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Joseph and his mother were marveling at the things which were spoken concerning him.

block.text: Papa wantaim mama bilong Jisas tupela i harim dispela tok Simeon i mekim long em, na tupela i tingting planti.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simeon blessed them, and said to Mary, his mother,

block.text: Na Simeon i givim blesing long ol, na em i tokim Maria, mama bilong pikinini, olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, this child is set for the falling and the rising of many in Israel, and for a sign which is spoken against.

block.text: "Harim. God i makim dispela pikinini bilong mekim planti Israel i pundaun, na bilong mekim planti i kirap gen. Em bai i stap olsem wanpela mak, na planti man bai i tok nogut long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, a sword will pierce through your own soul, that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed.”

block.text: Olsem na tingting hait bilong planti man bai i kamap ples klia. Na yu bai i stap olsem wanpela bainat i sutim lewa bilong yu tu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: There was one Anna, a prophetess, the daughter of Phanuel, of the tribe of Asher (she was of a great age, having lived with a husband seven years from her virginity.

block.text: Wanpela profet meri i stap, nem bilong en Ana. Em i pikinini bilong Fanuel bilong lain bilong Aser. Em i lapun tru. Bipo em i marit, na i stap 7 -pela yia wantaim man bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She had been a widow for about eighty-four years). She didn’t depart from the temple, worshipping with fastings and petitions night and day.

block.text: Na bihain man bilong en i dai, na em i stap nating. Na nau em i gat 84 krismas bilong en. Ana i no save lusim tempel. Em i save tambu long kaikai na i beten i stap, na em i holim wok bilong God long san na long nait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Coming up at that very hour, she gave thanks to the Lord, and spoke of him to all those who were looking for redemption in Jerusalem.

block.text: Long dispela taim em tu i kam klostu long pikinini na i tenkyu long God. Na em i autim tok bilong dispela pikinini long olgeta manmeri i wet long God i kisim bek ol manmeri bilong Jerusalem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had accomplished all things that were according to the law of the Lord, they returned into Galilee, to their own city, Nazareth.

block.text: Ol i mekim pinis olgeta samting olsem lo bilong Bikpela i tok, orait ol i go bek long Galili long Nasaret, em taun bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The child was growing, and was becoming strong in spirit, being filled with wisdom, and the grace of God was upon him.

block.text: Na pikinini em i kamap bikpela na i kamap strong. Em i gat planti gutpela save, na marimari bilong God i stap long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His parents went every year to Jerusalem at the feast of the Passover.

block.text: Long olgeta yia papamama bilong Jisas i save go long Jerusalem bilong lukim Bikpela De Bilong Tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he was twelve years old, they went up to Jerusalem according to the custom of the feast.

block.text: Jisas i gat 12 -pela krismas pinis, orait ol i bihainim pasin bilong dispela bikpela de na ol i go long Jerusalem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had fulfilled the days, as they were returning, the boy Jesus stayed behind in Jerusalem. Joseph and his mother didn’t know it.

block.text: Taim olgeta bilong ol dispela bikpela de bilong lotu i pinis, orait ol i go bek long ples. Tasol yangpela manki Jisas em i stap yet long Jerusalem. Na papamama bilong en i no save olsem em i stap yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She supposed him to be in the company. They went a day’s journey and then they looked for him among their relatives and acquaintances.

block.text: Tupela i ting em i wokabaut wantaim ol arapela manmeri. Olsem na tupela i wokabaut wanpela de olgeta. Na bihain tupela i wok long painim em namel long ol wanlain na ol pren.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they didn’t find him, they returned to Jerusalem, looking for him.

block.text: Tupela i painim painim, tasol tupela i no lukim. Olsem na tupela i go bek gen long Jerusalem bilong painim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened after three days they found him in the temple, sitting in the midst of the teachers, both listening to them, and asking them questions.

block.text: Tupela i wok long painim em inap long tripela de, na bihain tupela i lukim em i stap insait long banis bilong tempel. Em i sindaun i stap namel long ol tisa. Em i wok long harim tok bilong ol, na long askim ol tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who heard him were amazed at his understanding and his answers.

block.text: Ol man i harim tok bilong en, ol i kirap nogut long save bilong en na long tok em i bekim long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they saw him, they were astonished, and his mother said to him,

block.text: Tupela i lukim em na i kirap nogut tru. Na mama bilong en i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Son, why have you treated us this way? Behold, your father and I were anxiously looking for you.”

block.text: "Pikinini, bilong wanem yu mekim dispela pasin long mitupela? Bel bilong mi tupela papa bilong yu i hevi tumas na mitupela i wok long painim yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Tasol em i bekim tok olsem long tupela,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why were you looking for me? Didn’t you know that I must be in my Father’s house?”

block.text: "Bilong wanem yutupela i wok long painim mi? Ating yutupela i no save, mi mas i stap long haus bilong Papa bilong mi?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They didn’t understand the saying which he spoke to them.

block.text: Tasol tupela i no save long mining bilong dispela tok em i mekim long tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And he went down with them, and came to Nazareth. He was subject to them, and his mother kept all these sayings in her heart.

block.text: Orait em i go bek wantaim tupela, na ol i kamap long Nasaret, na oltaim em i save bihainim tok bilong tupela. Na mama bilong en i putim dispela olgeta tok long bel bilong en na i holim i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favor with God and men.

block.text: Na Jisas i kamap bikpela, na save bilong en i kamap gutpela tru. Na God i laikim em tru na ol man tu i laikim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE 3

Now it was the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar, Pontius Pilate being governor of Judea, and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee, and his brother Philip tetrarch of the region of Ituraea and Trachonitis, and Lysanias tetrarch of Abilene.

block.text: Long namba 15 yia bilong Sisar Taiberius i stap king bilong Rom, Pontius Pailat em i stap namba wan gavman bilong distrik Judia. Long dispela taim Herot i bosim distrik Galili. Na brata bilong en Filip i bosim distrik Ituria na Trakonitis, na Lisanias i bosim distrik Abilene.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the high priesthood of Annas and Caiaphas, the word of God came to John, the son of Zacharias, in the wilderness.

block.text: Na Anas tupela Kaiafas i stap hetpris. Long dispela taim Jon, pikinini bilong Sekaraia, em i stap long ples i no gat man, na God i givim tok bilong em long Jon.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came into all the region around the Jordan, preaching and saying:

block.text: Olsem na Jon i go long olgeta hap i stap klostu long wara Jordan, na em i autim tok long ol manmeri

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Receive this baptism of repentence for the forgiveness of sins.”

block.text: i mas tanim bel na kisim baptais, na bai God i tekewe sin bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As it is written in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet,

block.text: Dispela samting i kamap olsem tok i stap long buk bilong profet Aisaia,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The voice of one crying in the wilderness, ‘Make ready the way of the Lord. Make his paths straight.

block.text: "Long ples i no gat man, maus bilong wanpela man i singaut olsem, 'Redim rot bilong Bikpela. Stretim ol rot bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every valley will be filled. Every mountain and hill will be brought low. The crooked will become straight, and the rough ways smooth.
All flesh will see God’s salvation.’”

block.text: Pulapim olgeta ples daun, na brukim olgeta maunten i go daun. Olgeta rot i krungut, ol i mas wokim i kamap stret. Na olgeta rot i no gutpela, ol i mas stretim gut.
Na olgeta manmeri bilong graun bai i lukim wok God i mekim bilong kisim bek yumi.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said therefore to the multitudes who went out to be baptized by him,

block.text: Planti lain manmeri ol i kam bilong kisim baptais long han bilong Jon, na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You offspring of vipers, who warned you to flee from the wrath to come?

block.text: "Yupela pikinini bilong snek nogut, God i belhat long yupela na em bai i mekim save long yupela. Husat i tokim yupela na yupela i laik ranawe na abrusim dispela taim nogut i laik kamap long yupela?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance, and don’t begin to say among yourselves, ‘We have Abraham for our father;’ for I tell you that God is able to raise up children to Abraham from these stones!

block.text: Sapos yupela i tanim bel tru, orait pasin bilong yupela i mas soim olsem yupela i tanim bel pinis. Na maski toktok long yupela yet olsem, 'Abraham em i tumbuna papa bilong mipela.' Mi tokim yupela, God inap mekim ol dispela ston hia i kamap ol lain tumbuna pikinini bilong Abraham.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even now the axe also lies at the root of the trees. Every tree therefore that doesn’t bring forth good fruit is cut down, and thrown into the fire.”

block.text: Tamiok i stap pinis long as bilong diwai, na olgeta diwai i no save karim gutpela kaikai, em bai ol i katim na tromoi i go long paia."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The multitudes asked him,

block.text: Ol manmeri i harim tok bilong Jon, na ol i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What then must we do?”

block.text: "Bai mipela i mekim wanem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered them,

block.text: Na em i bekim tok olsem long ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He who has two coats, let him give to him who has none. He who has food, let him do likewise.”

block.text: "Man i gat tupela siot, em i mas givim wanpela long man i no gat. Na man i gat kaikai, em tu i mas mekim wankain pasin."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Tax collectors also came to be baptized, and they said to him,

block.text: Sampela man bilong kisim takis ol tu i kam bilong kisim baptais. Na ol i askim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Teacher, what must we do?”

block.text: "Tisa, bai mipela i mekim wanem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Collect no more than that which is appointed to you.”

block.text: "Yupela i mas kisim takismani inap olsem gavman i tokim yupela, na yupela i no ken pulim sampela moa."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Soldiers also asked him, saying,

block.text: Sampela soldia tu i askim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What about us? What must we do?”

block.text: "Na bai mipela i mekim wanem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na em i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Extort from no one by violence, neither accuse anyone wrongfully. Be content with your wages.”

block.text: "Yupela i no ken mekim nogut long ol arapela man na stilim mani bilong ol. Na yupela i no ken mekim kot giaman long ol bilong pulim mani bilong ol. Yupela i mas ting olsem pe bilong yupela em inap long yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: As the people were in expectation, and all men reasoned in their hearts concerning John,

block.text: Ol manmeri i lukim ol dispela samting na bel bilong ol i kirap na ol i tingting planti olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Could John be the Messiah?

block.text: "Ating Jon em i dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: John answered them all,

block.text: Olsem na Jon i bekim tok olsem long ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I indeed baptize you with water, but he comes who is mightier than I, the latchet of whose sandals I am not worthy to loosen. He will baptize you in the Holy Spirit and fire.

block.text: "Mi save baptaisim yupela long wara. Tasol bihain bai wanpela man i kam, na strong bilong en i winim strong bilong mi. Mi no gutpela man inap long mi lusim string i pasim su bilong en. Em bai i baptaisim yupela long Holi Spirit na long paia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His winnowing fork is in his hand, and he will thoroughly cleanse his threshing floor, and will gather the wheat into his barn; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire.”

block.text: Em bai i kam olsem man i holim savol long han bilong en, bilong rausim olgeta pipia i stap long wit bilong en. Na em bai i bungim wit long haus wit bilong en. Tasol pipia em bai i kukim long paia i no save dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then with many other exhortations he preached good news to the people.

block.text: Jon i mekim planti arapela tok tu bilong sutim bel bilong ol manmeri, na long dispela pasin em i wok long autim gutnius long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He reproved Herod, saying to him:

block.text: Jon i bin krosim Herot,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is unlawful for you to have your brother’s wife!”

block.text: em namba wan gavman bilong ol, long rong em i bin mekim long Herodias, em meri bilong brata bilong Herot,

ReferenceBlocks.text: And he reproved him for all the other evil things which Herod had done.

block.text: na long olgeta arapela pasin nogut Herot i bin mekim tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Herod did something even worse: He put John in prison.

block.text: Olsem na Herot i skruim wanpela rong moa long dispela olgeta rong em i bin mekim. Em i putim Jon long kalabus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now it happened, when all the people were baptized, Jesus also had been baptized, and was praying.

block.text: Taim olgeta manmeri i kisim baptais, Jisas tu i kisim baptais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The sky was opened,
and the Holy Spirit descended in a bodily form as a dove on him; and a voice came out of the sky, saying

block.text: Em i kisim baptais pinis, orait em i beten i stap, na heven i op,

na Holi Spirit i kam daun long em. Holi Spirit i kamap olsem wanpela bilong ol dispela kain pisin ol i kolim balus, na ol i lukim em i stap antap long het bilong Jisas. Na long heven wanpela maus i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are my beloved Son. In you I am well pleased.”

block.text: "Yu Pikinini bilong mi. Mi laikim yu tumas. Bel bilong mi em i amamas long yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus himself, when he began to teach, was about thirty years old, being the son (as was supposed) of Joseph, the son of Heli,

block.text: Taim Jisas i kirapim wok bilong en, i gat samting olsem 30 krismas. Na ol manmeri i ting em i pikinini bilong Josep. Josep em i pikinini bilong Heli.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Matthat, the son of Levi, the son of Melchi, the son of Jannai, the son of Joseph,

block.text: Na Heli em i pikinini bilong Matat. Na Matat em i pikinini bilong Livai. Na Livai em i pikinini bilong Melki. Na Melki em i pikinini bilong Janai. Na Janai em i pikinini bilong Josep.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Mattathias, the son of Amos, the son of Nahum, the son of Esli, the son of Naggai,

block.text: Na Josep em i pikinini bilong Matatias. Na Matatias em i pikinini bilong Amos. Na Amos em i pikinini bilong Nahum. Na Nahum em i pikinini bilong Esli. Na Esli em i pikinini bilong Nagai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Maath, the son of Mattathias, the son of Semein, the son of Joseph, the son of Judah,

block.text: Na Nagai em i pikinini bilong Mat. Na Mat em i pikinini bilong Matatias. Na Matatias em i pikinini bilong Semen. Na Semen em i pikinini bilong Josek. Na Josek em i pikinini bilong Joda.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Joanan, the son of Rhesa, the son of Zerubbabel, the son of Shealtiel, the son of Neri,

block.text: Na Joda em i pikinini bilong Joanan. Na Joanan em i pikinini bilong Resa. Na Resa em i pikinini bilong Serubabel. Na Serubabel em i pikinini bilong Sealtiel. Na Sealtiel em i pikinini bilong Neri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Melchi, the son of Addi, the son of Cosam, the son of Elmodam, the son of Er,

block.text: Na Neri em i pikinini bilong Melki. Na Melki em i pikinini bilong Adi. Na Adi em i pikinini bilong Kosam. Na Kosam em i pikinini bilong Elmadam. Na Elmadam em i pikinini bilong Er.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Jose, the son of Eliezer, the son of Jorim, the son of Matthat, the son of Levi,

block.text: Na Er em i pikinini bilong Josua. Na Josua em i pikinini bilong Elieser. Na Elieser em i pikinini bilong Jorim. Na Jorim em i pikinini bilong Matat. Na Matat em i pikinini bilong Livai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Simeon, the son of Judah, the son of Joseph, the son of Jonan, the son of Eliakim,

block.text: Na Livai em i pikinini bilong Simeon. Na Simeon em i pikinini bilong Juda. Na Juda em i pikinini bilong Josep. Na Josep em i pikinini bilong Jonam. Na Jonam em i pikinini bilong Eliakim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Melea, the son of Menan, the son of Mattatha, the son of Nathan, the son of David,

block.text: Na Eliakim em i pikinini bilong Melea. Na Melea em i pikinini bilong Mena. Na Mena em i pikinini bilong Matata. Na Matata em i pikinini bilong Natan. Na Natan em i pikinini bilong Devit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Jesse, the son of Obed, the son of Boaz, the son of Salmon, the son of Nahshon,

block.text: Na Devit em i pikinini bilong Jesi. Na Jesi em i pikinini bilong Obet. Na Obet em i pikinini bilong Boas. Na Boas em i pikinini bilong Salmon. Na Salmon em i pikinini bilong Nason.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Amminadab, the son of Aram, the son of Hezron, the son of Perez, the son of Judah,

block.text: Na Nason em i pikinini bilong Aminadap. Na Aminadap em i pikinini bilong Atmin. Na Atmin em i pikinini bilong Arni. Na Arni em i pikinini bilong Hesron. Na Hesron em i pikinini bilong Peres. Na Peres em i pikinini bilong Juda.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Jacob, the son of Isaac, the son of Abraham, the son of Terah, the son of Nahor,

block.text: Na Juda em i pikinini bilong Jekop. Na Jekop em i pikinini bilong Aisak. Na Aisak em i pikinini bilong Abraham. Na Abraham em i pikinini bilong Tera. Na Tera em i pikinini bilong Nahor.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Serug, the son of Reu, the son of Peleg, the son of Eber, the son of Shelah,

block.text: Na Nahor em i pikinini bilong Seruk. Na Seruk em i pikinini bilong Reu. Na Reu em i pikinini bilong Pelek. Na Pelek em i pikinini bilong Eber. Na Eber em i pikinini bilong Sela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Cainan, the son of Arphaxad, the son of Shem, the son of Noah, the son of Lamech,

block.text: Na Sela em i pikinini bilong Kainan. Na Kainan em i pikinini bilong Arpaksat. Na Arpaksat em i pikinini bilong Siem. Na Siem em i pikinini bilong Noa. Na Noa em i pikinini bilong Lamek.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Methuselah, the son of Enoch, the son of Jared, the son of Mahalaleel, the son of Cainan,

block.text: Na Lamek em i pikinini bilong Metusela. Na Metusela em i pikinini bilong Enok. Na Enok em i pikinini bilong Jaret. Na Jaret em i pikinini bilong Mahalalel. Na Mahalalel em i pikinini bilong Kenan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: the son of Enos, the son of Seth, the son of Adam, the son of God.

block.text: Na Kenan em i pikinini bilong Enos. Na Enos em i pikinini bilong Set. Na Set em i pikinini bilong Adam. Na Adam em i pikinini bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE 4
Jesus, full of the Holy Spirit, returned from the Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness.

block.text: Holi Spirit i pulap long Jisas, na Jisas i lusim wara Jordan na i go bek. Na Holi Spirit i kisim em i go long ples i no gat man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For forty days he was being tempted by the devil. He ate nothing in those days. Afterward, when they were completed, he was hungry.
The devil said to him,

block.text: Jisas i stap long ples i no gat man inap long 40 de, na Satan I traim em.
Na Satan i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you are the Son of God, command this stone to become bread.”

block.text: "Sapos i tru yu Pikinini Bilong God, orait yu tok na dispela ston i ken tanim na i kamap bret."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him, saying,

block.text: Tasol Jisas i bekim tok bilong en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It is written, ‘Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word of God.’”

block.text: "Buk bilong God i gat tok olsem, 'Ol manmeri i no inap kisim laip long kaikai tasol.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The devil, leading him up on a high mountain, showed him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time.
The devil said to him,

block.text: Orait na Satan i bringim em i go antap, na wantu em i soim Jisas olgeta strongpela kantri bilong dispela graun.
Na Satan i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will give you all this authority, and their glory, for it has been delivered to me; and I give it to whomever I want.

block.text: "Bai mi givim yu strong bilong bosim olgeta dispela kantri, na bai yu gat biknem tru. Olgeta dispela samting ol i bilong mi pinis. Na sapos mi laik givim long wanpela man, orait mi ken givim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If you therefore will worship before me, it will all be yours.”

block.text: Sapos yu brukim skru na lotu long mi, orait bai mi givim yu dispela olgeta samting."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered him,

block.text: Tasol Jisas i bekim tok bilong em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Get behind me Satan! For it is written, ‘You shall worship the Lord your God, and you shall serve him only.’”

block.text: "Buk bilong God i gat tok olsem, 'Yu mas aninit long God, Bikpela bilong yu, na yu mas lotu long em wanpela tasol.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: He led him to Jerusalem, and set him on the pinnacle of the temple, and said to him,

block.text: Na Satan i bringim Jisas i go long Jerusalem na i putim em antap tru long tempel. Na em i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you are the Son of God, cast yourself down from here.

block.text: "Sapos i tru yu Pikinini Bilong God, orait yu kalap i go daun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For it is written, ‘He will put his angels in charge of you, to guard you;’

block.text: Long wanem, buk bilong God i gat tok olsem, 'Em bai i tokim ol ensel bilong en long ol i mas lukautim yu na was gut long yu.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: and, ‘On their hands they will bear you up, lest perhaps you dash your foot against a stone.’”

block.text: Na 'Ol bai i karim yu long han bilong ol, nogut wanpela ston i sutim lek bilong yu.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answering, said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “It has been said, ‘You shall not tempt the Lord your God.’”

block.text: "Buk bilong God i gat tok olsem, 'Yu no ken traim strong bilong God, Bikpela bilong yu.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the devil had completed every temptation, he departed from him until another time.

block.text: Satan i traim Jisas long ol kain kain traim pinis, orait em i lusim Jisas na i wetim narapela taim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee, and news about him spread through all the surrounding area.

block.text: Long strong bilong Holi Spirit, Jisas i go bek long distrik Galili. Na ol manmeri i stap long olgeta dispela hap, ol i harim tok olsem Jisas i kam i stap long Galili.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He taught in their synagogues, being glorified by all.

block.text: Oltaim em i wok long skulim ol manmeri long ol haus lotu bilong ol. Na olgeta manmeri i litimapim nem bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came to Nazareth, where he had been brought up. He entered, as was his custom, into the synagogue on the Sabbath day, and stood up to read.

block.text: Jisas i go long Nasaret. Taim em i pikinini yet, em i stap long dispela taun, na em i bin kamap bikpela long en. Long de Sabat em i go insait long haus lotu, olsem em i save mekim oltaim. Em i sanap bilong ritim tok bilong God,

ReferenceBlocks.text: The book of the prophet Isaiah was handed to him. He opened the book, and found the place where it was written,

block.text: na ol i givim buk bilong profet Aisaia long em. Em i opim buk, na em i painim dispela hap i gat tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Spirit of the Lord is on me, because he has anointed me to preach good news to the poor.

block.text: "Spirit bilong Bikpela i kam i stap long mi, long wanem, Bikpela yet i kapsaitim wel long het bilong mi bilong makim mi bilong i go bringim gutpela tok bilong en long ol rabisman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has sent me to heal the brokenhearted, to proclaim release to the captives, recovering of sight to the blind, to deliver those who are crushed,
and to proclaim the acceptable year of the Lord.”

block.text: Na em i salim mi i kam long tokaut long ol man i stap long kalabus long ol i ken lusim kalabus na i go fri, na long tokaut long ol man i aipas long ol i ken lukluk gen. Em i salim mi i kam long pinisim hevi bilong ol man, ol arapela i wok long daunim na mekim nogut long ol.
Na em i salim mi long tokaut olsem, taim i kamap pinis bilong Bikpela i laik mekim gut long ol manmeri bilong en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He closed the book, gave it back to the attendant, and sat down. The eyes of all in the synagogue were fastened on him.
He began to tell them,

block.text: Jisas i pasim buk na i givim bek long man i gat wok bilong lukautim ol buk, na em i sindaun. Na olgeta manmeri i stap long haus lotu ol I lukluk long Jisas tasol.
Orait na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Today, this Scripture has been fulfilled in your hearing.”

block.text: "Dispela tok bilong buk bilong God yupela i harim pinis, nau tasol em i kamap tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: All testified about him, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth, and they said,

block.text: Na ol i litimapim nem bilong em, na ol i tingting planti long ol gutpela tok em i autim. Tasol ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Isn’t this Joseph’s son?”

block.text: "Yumi save, dispela man em i pikinini bilong Josep. Olsem wanem na em inap mekim olkain tok olsem?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Doubtless you will tell me this parable, ‘Physician, heal yourself! Whatever we have heard done at Capernaum, do also here in your hometown.’”

block.text: "Ating yupela bai i kisim dispela tok ol manmeri i save mekim na autim long mi, 'Dokta, yu mas mekim orait skin bilong yu yet.' Na bai yupela i tok, 'Mipela i harim pinis tok long ol samting yu bin mekim long Kaperneam. Orait nau yu mas mekim ol wankain samting hia long as ples bilong yu.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Most certainly I tell you, no prophet is acceptable in his hometown.

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, ol man i no save harim tok bilong wanpela profet long as ples bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But truly I tell you, there were many widows in Israel in the days of Elijah, when the sky was shut up three years and six months, when a great famine came over all the land.

block.text: Mi tok tru tumas long yupela, long taim bilong Elaija, planti meri i stap long Israel, na man bilong ol i dai pinis. Long dispela taim skai i pas olgeta, na i no gat ren inap long 3 yia na 6 mun. Na bikpela hangre i kamap long olgeta hap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Elijah was sent to none of them, except to Zarephath, in the land of Sidon, to a woman who was a widow.

block.text: Tasol God i no salim Elaija i go long wanpela meri bilong Israel. Nogat. Em i salim em i go long taun Sarefat tasol long hap bilong biktaun Saidon, long wanpela meri, man bilong en i dai pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There were many lepers in Israel in the time of Elisha the prophet, yet not one of them was cleansed, except Naaman, the Syrian.”

block.text: Olsem tu long taim bilong profet Elisa planti man i stap long Israel, ol i gat sik lepra. Tasol namel long ol i no gat wanpela man sik bilong en i pinis. Nogat. Naman bilong kantri Siria em tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were all filled with wrath in the synagogue, as they heard these things.

block.text: Olgeta man i stap long haus lotu ol i harim dispela tok, na ol i belhat nogut tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They rose up, threw him out of the city, and led him to the brow of the hill that their city was built on, that they might throw him off the cliff.

block.text: Na ol i kirap na ol i rausim Jisas i go ausait long taun. Dispela taun bilong ol i stap antap long wanpela maunten. Na ol i bringim em i go antap long wanpela ples nogut i stap long dispela maunten, na ol i laik tromoi em i go daun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he, passing through their midst, went his way.

block.text: Tasol em i lusim ol na wokabaut namel long ol na em i go pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came down to Capernaum, a city of Galilee. He was teaching them on the Sabbath day.

block.text: Orait Jisas i go daun long Kaperneam, na em i stap long dispela taun bilong distrik Galili. Na long olgeta de Sabat em i save skulim ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were astonished at his teaching, for his word was with authority.

block.text: Na ol i harim tok bilong en na ol i kirap nogut tru, long wanem, em i skulim ol olsem man i gat namba.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the synagogue there was a man who had a spirit of an unclean demon, and he cried out with a loud voice, saying,

block.text: Wanpela taim wanpela man i stap long haus lotu, em i gat spirit nogut i stap long en. Na em i singaut bikmaus tru olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What have we to do with you, Jesus of Nazareth? Have you come to destroy us? I know you who you are: the Holy One of God!”

block.text: "E, Jisas bilong Nasaret, yu kam bilong mekim wanem long mipela? Ating yu kam bilong bagarapim mipela? Mi save long yu. Yu dispela gutpela stretpela man i kam long God yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus rebuked him, saying,

block.text: Tasol Jisas i krosim dispela spirit nogut na i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Be silent, and come out of him!”

block.text: "Yu pasim maus na yu lusim dispela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the demon had thrown him down in their midst, he came out of him, having done him no harm.

block.text: Na dispela spirit nogut i mekim dispela man i pundaun long graun namel long ol, na bihain spirit i lusim em, na i no bagarapim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Amazement came on all, and they spoke together, one with another, saying,

block.text: Na olgeta manmeri i kirap nogut, na ol i toktok namel long ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What is this word? For with authority and power he commands the unclean spirits, and they come out!”

block.text: "Olaman, em wanem kain tok? Em i givim tok long ol spirit nogut olsem man i gat namba na i gat strong. Na ol i save harim tok bilong en, na ol i lusim man na i go."

ReferenceBlocks.text: News about him went out into every place of the surrounding region.

block.text: Na ol stori bilong ol samting Jisas i mekim, ol i go nabaut long olgeta hap bilong dispela distrik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He rose up from the synagogue, and entered into Simon’s house. Simon’s mother-in-law was afflicted with a great fever, and they begged him for her.

block.text: Jisas i kirap na i lusim dispela haus lotu, na em i go insait long haus bilong Saimon. Mama bilong meri bilong Saimon em i gat sik, na skin bilong en i hat nogut tru. Na ol i askim Jisas long helpim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He stood over her, and rebuked the fever; and it left her. Immediately she rose up and served them.

block.text: Orait Jisas i go sanap klostu long em na i tok strong long sik i mas lusim dispela meri. Na sik i lusim em, na wantu dispela meri i kirap na i redim kaikai bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the sun was setting, all those who had any sick with various diseases brought them to him; and he laid his hands on every one of them, and healed them.

block.text: Long taim san i laik i go daun, orait ol man wantok bilong ol i gat ol kain kain sik, ol i bringim ol dispela sikman i kam long Jisas. Em i putim han bilong en antap long dispela olgeta manmeri wan wan, na em i mekim ol i orait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Demons also came out from many, crying out, and saying,

block.text: Na em i mekim ol spirit nogut i lusim planti manmeri. Na taim ol i lusim ol manmeri, ol spirit nogut i save singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are the Christ, the Son of God!”

block.text: "Yu Pikinini Bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Rebuking them, he didn’t allow them to speak, because they knew that he was the Christ.

block.text: Tasol em i krosim ol na em i tambuim ol long ol i no ken toktok, long wanem, ol i save, em i dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When it was day, he departed and went into an uninhabited place. The multitudes looked for him and found him. They held on to him so that he wouldn’t go away from them.
But he said to them,

block.text: Long moningtaim tru Jisas i lusim taun na em i go long wanpela hap i no gat man. Na ol manmeri i painim em, na taim ol i lukim em ol i laik pasim em, bai em i no ken lusim ol na i go.
Tasol em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I must preach the good news of the Kingdom of God to the other cities also. For this reason I have been sent.”

block.text: "Mi mas autim gutnius bilong kingdom bilong God long ol arapela taun tu. God i salim mi na mi kam bilong mekim dispela wok."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He was preaching in the synagogues of Galilee.

block.text: Na em i raun long distrik Judia na i autim tok long ol haus lotu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE 5
Now it happened, while the multitude pressed on him and heard the word of God, that he was standing by the lake of Gennesaret.

block.text: Wanpela taim Jisas i sanap long nambis bilong raunwara Genesaret, na planti manmeri i kam long em bilong harim tok bilong God, na ol i sanap klostu long em na banisim em tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He saw two boats standing by the lake, but the fishermen had gone out of them, and were washing their nets.

block.text: Na Jisas i lukim tupela bot i stap long nambis bilong raunwara, em ol bot bilong ol man bilong kisim pis. Tasol ol dispela man i lusim bot, na ol i wok long wasim ol umben.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He entered into one of the boats, which was Simon’s, and asked him to put out a little from the land. He sat down and taught the multitudes from the boat.

block.text: Orait Jisas i kalap long wanpela bot, em bot bilong Saimon. Na em i tokim Saimon long kam insait long bot na subim bot i go lusim nambis liklik. Na Jisas i sindaun long bot na i skulim ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had finished speaking, he said to Simon,

block.text: Em i skulim ol pinis, orait bihain em i tokim Saimon olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Put out into the deep, and let down your nets for a catch.”

block.text: "Pul i go namel long wara, na yutupela tromoi ol umben i go daun bilong kisim pis."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Simon answered him,

block.text: Na Saimon i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Master, we worked all night, and took nothing; but at your word I will let down the net.”

block.text: "Bikman, long nait mipela i wok hat tru i go inap tulait, na mipela i no kisim wanpela pis. Tasol bai mi bihainim tok bilong yu na tromoi ol umben."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had done this, they caught a great multitude of fish, and their net was breaking.

block.text: Ol i mekim olsem, na ol i kisim bikpela lain pis moa, na ol umben i laik bruk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They beckoned to their partners in the other boat, that they should come and help them. They came, and filled both boats, so that they began to sink.

block.text: Olsem na tupela i singautim ol poroman bilong ol i stap long narapela bot, long kam helpim ol. Na ol i kam, na ol i pulimapim pis long tupela bot. Na tupela bot i pulap tru na i laik i go daun long wara.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Simon Peter, when he saw it, fell down at Jesus’ knees, saying,

block.text: Saimon Pita i lukim dispela, na em i brukim skru klostu long lek bilong Jisas na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Depart from me, for I am a sinful man, Lord.”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu lusim mi na yu go. Mi man bilong sin."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he was amazed, and all who were with him, at the catch of fish which they had caught.

block.text: Em i lukim olgeta dispela pis ol i kisim, na em i kirap nogut tru. Na ol poroman bilong en, ol tu i kirap nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: James and John, sons of Zebedee, who were partners with Simon were also amazed. Jesus said to Simon,

block.text: Tupela poroman bilong Saimon, em Jems wantaim Jon, tupela pikinini bilong Sebedi, tupela tu i kirap nogut. Tasol Jisas i tokim Saimon olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t be afraid. From now on you will be fishers of men!”

block.text: "Yu no ken pret. Nau yu wok long kisim pis, tasol bihain bai yu wok long kisim ol manmeri i kam long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had brought their boats to land, they left everything, and followed him.

block.text: Orait ol i pul i go sua, na ol i lusim olgeta samting bilong ol, na ol i bihainim Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, while he was in one of the cities, behold, there was a man full of leprosy. When he saw Jesus, he fell on his face, and begged him, saying,

block.text: Wanpela taim Jisas i stap long wanpela taun, na wanpela man i stap, em i gat sik lepra i pulap tru long bodi bilong em. Em i lukim Jisas, na em i brukim skru na putim pes i go daun long graun na i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, if you want to, you can make me clean.”

block.text: "Bikpela, sapos yu laik, yu inap long mekim mi i kamap klin long ai bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He stretched out his hand, and touched him, saying,

block.text: Na Jisas i putim han long em na I tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I want to... Be made clean.”

block.text: "Mi laik. Yu kamap klin."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately the leprosy left him.
He commanded him to tell no one,

block.text: Na wantu sik lepra i lusim dispela man, na em i kamap klin.
Na Jisas i tok strong long em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But go your way, and show yourself to the priest, and offer for your cleansing according to what Moses commanded, for a testimony to them.”

block.text: "Yu no ken tokim wanpela man long dispela samting i bin kamap long yu. Nogat. Yu go soim skin bilong yu long pris, na mekim ofa bilong soim olsem skin bilong yu i kamap klin pinis, olsem Moses i bin tok. Na bai ol man i ken save, sik bilong yu i pinis."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the report concerning him spread much more, and great multitudes came together to hear, and to be healed by him of their infirmities.

block.text: Tasol stori bilong ol samting Jisas i mekim em i raun i go moa yet. Olsem na planti man moa ol i kam bilong harim tok bilong em, na bilong em i mekim orait ol sik bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He withdrew himself into the desert, and prayed.

block.text: Tasol planti taim em i save lusim ol manmeri na i go long hap i no gat man, na em i save beten.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened on one of those days, that he was teaching; and there were Pharisees and teachers of the law sitting by, who had come out of every village of Galilee, Judea, and Jerusalem. The power of the Lord was with him to heal them.

block.text: Wanpela de Jisas i skulim ol manmeri i stap, na ol Farisi na ol tisa bilong lo ol i sindaun i stap. Ol i bin lusim taun Jerusalem na olgeta ples bilong distrik Galili na Judia na ol i kam. Na strong bilong Bikpela em i stap long Jisas na em i wok long mekim orait ol sikman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, men brought a paralyzed man on a cot, and they sought to bring him in to lay before Jesus.

block.text: Na sampela man i karim wanpela man i kam. Ol bun bilong dispela man i dai olgeta, na em i slip i stap long wanpela bet. Ol i laik karim em i go insait long haus na putim em klostu long Jisas,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Not finding a way to bring him in because of the multitude, they went up to the housetop, and let him down through the tiles with his cot into the midst before Jesus.

block.text: tasol planti manmeri i stap na ples i pas, na i no gat rot bilong karim sikman i go insait. Olsem na ol i go antap long rup bilong dispela haus Jisas i stap long en. Na ol i rausim hap bilong rup, na ol i slekim bet dispela man i slip long en i go daun namel long ol manmeri, na ol i putim em i stap long pes bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Seeing their faith, he said to him,

block.text: Jisas i lukim olsem ol i bilip tru, na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Man, your sins are forgiven you.”

block.text: "Pren, mi lusim pinis ol sin bilong yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The scribes and the Pharisees began to reason, saying,

block.text: Ol saveman bilong lo na ol Farisi i harim dispela tok, orait ol i toktok planti olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who is this that speaks blasphemies? Who can forgive sins, but God alone?”

block.text: "Dispela man em i husat na em I laik kisim ples bilong God na i mekim dispela tok? I no gat wanpela man em inap long lusim sin. Em i wok bilong God wanpela tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Jesus, perceiving their thoughts, answered them,

block.text: Jisas i save pinis long tingting bilong ol, na em i bekim tok olsem long ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why are you reasoning so in your hearts?

block.text: "Bilong wanem yupela i gat dispela kain tingting long bel bilong yupela?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Which is easier to say, ‘Your sins are forgiven you;’ or to say, ‘Arise and walk?’

block.text: Wanem tok em i isi long mi mekim? Em i isi long mi tok, 'Mi lusim ol sin bilong yu,' o em i isi long mi tok, 'Yu kirap na wokabaut'?

ReferenceBlocks.text: But that you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins”

block.text: Tasol mi laik bai yupela i save olsem, Pikinini Bilong Man em i gat strong long dispela graun, na em inap long lusim ol sin."

ReferenceBlocks.text: (he said to the paralyzed man),

block.text: Orait na Jisas i lukluk i go long dispela man bun bilong en i dai olgeta na i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I tell you, arise, and take up your cot, and go to your house.”

block.text: "Mi tokim yu, yu kirap na kisim bet bilong yu, na yu go long haus bilong yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately he rose up before them, and took up that which he was laying on, and departed to his house, glorifying God.

block.text: Na wantu tasol dispela man i kirap long ai bilong ol dispela manmeri, na em i kisim bet em i bin slip long en. Na em i wok long litimapim nem bilong God na i wokabaut i go long haus bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Amazement took hold on all, and they glorified God. They were filled with fear, saying,

block.text: Na olgeta manmeri i kirap nogut tru long lukim dispela samting. Bel bilong ol i kirap long lukim bikpela strong bilong God na ol i litimapim nem bilong God na tok olsem,

block.characterId: everyone seeing healing of paralyzed man

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: everyone seeing healing of paralyzed man
ReferenceBlocks.text: “We have seen strange things today.”

block.text: "Nau yumi lukim ol narakain samting tru i kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: After these things he went out, and saw a tax collector named Levi sitting at the tax office, and said to him,

block.text: Bihain Jisas i wokabaut i go na em i lukim wanpela man bilong kisim takis em i sindaun i stap long haus takis. Nem bilong dispela man em Livai. Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Follow me!”

block.text: "Yu kam bihainim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He left everything, and rose up and followed him.

block.text: Na Livai i kirap na i lusim olgeta samting i stap, na em i go bihainim Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Levi made a great feast for him in his house. There was a great crowd of tax collectors and others who were reclining with them.

block.text: Orait Livai i mekim wanpela bikpela kaikai bilong Jisas long haus bilong em. Planti man bilong kisim takis, na planti arapela man tu, ol i sindaun na i kaikai wantaim tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Their scribes and the Pharisees murmured against his disciples, saying,

block.text: Na ol Farisi wantaim ol saveman bilong lo bilong lain Farisi ol i toktok planti long ol disaipel bilong Jisas. Ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you eat and drink with the tax collectors and sinners?”

block.text: "Watpo yupela i save kaikai na dring wantaim ol man bilong kisim takis na ol man bilong mekim sin?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus answered them,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok bilong ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Those who are healthy have no need for a physician, but those who are sick do.

block.text: "Ol man i no gat sik ol I no save go long dokta. Nogat. Ol sikman tasol i save go long dokta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have not come to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.”

block.text: Olsem tasol, mi no kam bilong singautim ol stretpela man long tanim bel. Nogat. Mi kam bilong singautim ol man i save mekim sin."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to him,

block.text: Na ol man i tokim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do John’s disciples often fast and pray, likewise also the disciples of the Pharisees, but yours eat and drink?”

block.text: "Planti taim ol disaipel bilong Jon i save tambu long kaikai na beten. Na ol disaipel bilong ol Farisi tu i save mekim olsem. Tasol ol disaipel bilong yu ol i wok long kaikai na dring."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Can you make the friends of the bridegroom fast, while the bridegroom is with them?

block.text: "Sapos wanpela man i laik marit, ating yupela inap tokim ol wantok bilong en long ol i mas tambu long kaikai long taim dispela man i stap yet wantaim ol? Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the days will come when the bridegroom will be taken away from them. Then they will fast in those days.”

block.text: Tasol bihain, taim ol i kisim dispela man i go pinis na em i no moa i stap wantaim ol wantok bilong en, orait long dispela taim ol bai i tambu long kaikai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He also told a parable to them.

block.text: Jisas i givim wanpela tok piksa tu long ol. Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “No one puts a piece from a new garment on an old garment, or else he will tear the new, and also the piece from the new will not match the old.

block.text: "Sapos wanpela olpela saket i gat hul, i no gat man i save kisim wanpela nupela saket na brukim bilong kisim hap laplap bilong samapim hul long olpela saket. Sapos em i mekim olsem, em bai i bagarapim nupela saket, na tu dispela liklik hap nupela laplap bai em i no wankain olsem olpela saket.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No one puts new wine into old wineskins, or else the new wine will burst the skins, and it will be spilled, and the skins will be destroyed.

block.text: Na i no gat man i save pulimapim nupela wain long olpela skin meme. Sapos em i mekim olsem, bai nupela wain i brukim skin meme na wain i kapsait i go long graun. Na skin meme tu bai i bagarap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But new wine must be put into fresh wineskins, and both are preserved.

block.text: Olsem na ol i mas pulimapim nupela wain long nupela skin meme.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No man having drunk old wine immediately desires new, for he says, ‘The old is better.’”

block.text: Na man i dringim pinis olpela wain, em i no save laikim nupela. Em i save tok, 'Olpela em i gutpela.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE 6
Now it happened on the second Sabbath after the first, that he was going through the grain fields. His disciples plucked the heads of grain, and ate, rubbing them in their hands.

block.text: Long wanpela de Sabat, Jisas i wokabaut namel long ol gaden wit. Na ol disaipel bilong en i kisim ol pikinini bilong wit, na ol i rapim long han bilong rausim skin bilong wit, na ol i wok long kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But some of the Pharisees said to them,

block.text: Tasol sampela Farisi i lukim na ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you do that which is not lawful to do on the Sabbath day?”
