ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so you also, when you see these things happening, know that the Kingdom of God is near.

block.text: Olsem tasol, taim yupela i lukim ol dispela samting i kamap, yupela i ken save, kingdom bilong God i kam klostu pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Most certainly I tell you, this generation will not pass away until all things are accomplished.

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yupela, taim ol manmeri bilong dispela taim i no i dai yet, dispela olgeta samting bai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will by no means pass away.”

block.text: Skai wantaim graun bai i pinis, tasol tok bilong mi bai i no inap lus."

ReferenceBlocks.text: “So be careful, or your hearts will be loaded down with carousing, drunkenness, and cares of this life, and that day will come on you suddenly.

block.text: Jisas i tok moa olsem, "Tasol yupela lukaut gut. Nogut yupela i dring nabaut oltaim na yupela i spak. Na nogut yupela i wari long ol samting bilong bodi. Sapos kain pasin olsem i daunim yupela, orait dispela de bilong Bikpela bai i kamap long yupela wantu tasol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For it will come like a snare on all those who dwell on the surface of all the earth.

block.text: olsem umben i save holimpas abus, long wanem, dispela de bai i kamap long olgeta manmeri i stap long olgeta hap bilong graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore be watchful all the time, praying that you may be counted worthy to escape all these things that will happen, and to stand before the Son of Man.”

block.text: Oltaim oltaim yupela i mas was i stap. Na yupela i mas beten oltaim long God i givim strong long yupela. Olsem na bai yupela i abrusim olgeta dispela samting i laik kamap, na bai yupela i sanap long ai bilong Pikinini Bilong Man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every day Jesus was teaching in the temple, and every night he would go out and spend the night on the mountain that is called Olivet.

block.text: Olgeta de Jisas i save skulim ol manmeri insait long banis bilong tempel. Tasol long nait em i save go slip long wanpela haus i stap long dispela maunten ol i kolim Oliv.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All the people came early in the morning to him in the temple to hear him.

block.text: Na olgeta manmeri i save kirap long moningtaim tru, na ol i kam long tempel bilong harim tok bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE 22
Now the feast of unleavened bread, which is called the Passover, drew near.

block.text: Bikpela De Bilong Bret I No Gat Yis, em ol i save kolim Bikpela De Bilong Tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut, em i laik kamap nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The chief priests and the scribes sought how they might put him to death, for they feared the people.

block.text: Na ol bikpris na ol saveman bilong lo ol i pret long ol manmeri, olsem na ol i painim rot bilong kilim Jisas i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Satan entered into Judas, who was surnamed Iscariot, who was numbered with the twelve.

block.text: Na Satan i go insait long bel bilong Judas, em ol i kolim Iskariot, em wanpela bilong ol 12 -pela disaipel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went to talk with the chief priests and captains, saying:

block.text: Na em i go toktok wantaim ol bikpris na ol kepten bilong tempel. Em i laik painim rot bilong

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will deliver him to you.”

block.text: givim Jisas long han bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were glad, and said:

block.text: Ol dispela man i amamas long lukim em, na ol i tokim Judas olsem ol bai i

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We will pay you for this.”

block.text: givim sampela mani long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He consented, and sought an opportunity to deliver him to them in the absence of the multitude.

block.text: Na Judas i orait long tok bilong ol, na em i wok long painim wanpela rot bilong putim Jisas long han bilong ol. Em i wetim wanpela taim ol bikpela lain manmeri i no i stap wantaim Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The day of unleavened bread came, on which the Passover must be sacrificed.

block.text: Bikpela De Bilong Bret I No Gat Yis em i kamap. Long dispela de ol i mas kilim pikinini sipsip bilong kaikai bilong tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He sent Peter and John, saying,

block.text: Olsem na Jisas i salim Pita tupela Jon i go, na em i tokim tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Go and prepare the Passover for us, that we may eat.”

block.text: "Yutupela go redim kaikai bilong yumi bilong dispela bikpela de."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to him,

block.text: Na tupela i askim em,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where do you want us to prepare?”

block.text: "Yu laikim bai mitupela i go redim we?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na em i tokim tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Behold, when you have entered into the city, a man carrying a pitcher of water will meet you. Follow him into the house which he enters.

block.text: "Harim. Yutupela go insait long taun, na wanpela man i karim bikpela sospen wara bai i bungim yutupela long rot. Yutupela bihainim em i go insait long dispela haus em i go insait long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Tell the master of the house, ‘The Teacher says to you, “Where is the guest room, where I may eat the Passover with my disciples?”’

block.text: Na yutupela i mas tokim papa bilong dispela haus olsem, 'Tisa i askim yu, "Dispela rum i stap we na mi wantaim ol disaipel bilong mi i ken kaikai dispela kaikai bilong tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut?'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will show you a large, furnished upper room. Make preparations there.”

block.text: Na bai em i soim yutupela wanpela bikpela rum i stap antap, em i gat tebol na sia samting. Yutupela redim kaikai long dispela rum."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They went, found things as he had told them, and they prepared the Passover.

block.text: Orait tupela i go, na tupela i lukim ol samting i stap olsem Jisas i bin tokim tupela. Na tupela i redim kaikai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the hour had come, he sat down with the twelve apostles.
He said to them,

block.text: Taim bilong kaikai i kamap pinis, na Jisas i sindaun long tebol, na ol aposel i sindaun wantaim em.
Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I have earnestly desired to eat this Passover with you before I suffer.

block.text: "Mi laikim tumas long kaikai wantaim yupela long dispela Bikpela De Bilong Tingim De God i Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut. Na bihain bai mi karim pen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I tell you, I will no longer by any means eat of it until it is fulfilled in the Kingdom of God.”

block.text: Mi tokim yupela, mi no ken kaikai dispela kaikai gen inap long taim dispela samting em i kamap tru long kingdom bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He received a cup, and when he had given thanks, he said,

block.text: Na em i kisim wanpela kap wain, na em i tenkyu long God, na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Take this, and share it among yourselves.

block.text: "Yupela kisim dispela na tilim namel long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I tell you, I will not drink at all again from the fruit of the vine, until the Kingdom of God comes.”

block.text: Long wanem, mi tokim yupela, nau na bihain tu mi no ken dring wain moa, inap long taim kingdom bilong God i kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He took bread, and when he had given thanks, he broke it, and gave to them, saying,

block.text: Na em i kisim wanpela bret, na i tenkyu long God, na i brukim, na i givim long ol disaipel. Na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is my body which is given for you. Do this in memory of me.”

block.text: "Dispela em i bodi bilong mi, mi givim bilong helpim yupela. Yupela i mas mekim olsem bilong tingim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Likewise, he took the cup after supper, saying,

block.text: Taim ol i kaikai pinis, orait em i kisim kap wain na i mekim wankain pasin long en. Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This cup is the new covenant in my blood, which is poured out for you.

block.text: "Dispela kap wain em i nupela kontrak mi mekim long blut bilong mi, em mi kapsaitim bilong helpim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But behold, the hand of him who betrays me is with me on the table.

block.text: Tasol lukim, han bilong dispela man i laik putim mi long han bilong ol birua em i stap wantaim mi long dispela tebol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Son of Man indeed goes, as it has been determined, but woe to that man through whom he is betrayed!”

block.text: Pikinini Bilong Man em i mas bihainim dispela rot bipo God i makim bilong em. Tasol sori tumas long dispela man i givim em long han bilong ol birua."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They began to question among themselves, saying:

block.text: Ol disaipel i harim dispela tok na ol i kirap askim askim ol yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who among us would do such a terrible thing?”

block.text: "Husat bai i mekim dispela pasin?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: There also arose a contention among them. They argued, saying:

block.text: Orait ol disaipel i stat long pait long toktok long

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Which one of us is the greatest?”

block.text: husat em i namba wan bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The kings of the nations lord it over them, and those who have authority over them are called ‘benefactors.’

block.text: "Ol king bilong ol arapela lain manmeri ol i gat namba na ol i bosim ol, na ol i gat nem olsem man bilong mekim gutpela pasin long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But not so with you. But one who is the greater among you, let him become as the younger, and one who is governing, as one who serves.

block.text: Tasol yupela i no ken mekim olsem. Nogat. Man i stap namba wan namel long yupela, em i mas i stap olsem man i kamap bihain tru. Na hetman bilong yupela em i mas i stap olsem wokman bilong helpim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For who is greater, one who sits at the table, or one who serves? Isn’t it he who sits at the table? But I am in the midst of you as one who serves.

block.text: Tingim. Husat em i namba wan? Ating man i sindaun kaikai o wokman i sutim kaikai na bringim i kam long en? Namba wan em dispela man i sindaun kaikai, em tasol. Tasol mi stap namel long yupela olsem wokman bilong helpim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you are those who have continued with me in my trials.

block.text: "Taim ol samting i kamap bilong traim mi, yupela i bin i stap wantaim mi, na yupela i no lusim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I confer on you a kingdom, even as my Father conferred on me.

block.text: Papa bilong mi em i givim kingdom long mi, olsem tasol mi givim kingdom long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then you may eat and drink at my table in my Kingdom. You will sit on thrones, judging the twelve tribes of Israel.”

block.text: Na long kingdom bilong mi yupela bai i sindaun long tebol bilong mi na kaikai na dring. Na yupela bai i sindaun long ol gutpela sia na yupela bai i bosim ol 12 -pela lain bilong Israel."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Lord said,

block.text: Orait Jisas i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Simon, Simon, behold, Satan asked to have you, that he might sift you as wheat,

block.text: "Saimon, Saimon, harim. Satan i tok pinis long em bai i traim bilip bilong yupela, olsem ol man i save sakim wit bilong rausim ol pipia long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but I prayed for you, that your faith wouldn’t fail. You, when once you have turned again, must help to strengthen your brothers.”

block.text: Tasol mi beten pinis bilong helpim yu, bai bilip bilong yu i no ken pundaun. Na taim yu tanim na yu kam bek, orait yu mas strongim ol brata bilong yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to him,

block.text: Na Pita i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, I am ready to go with you both to prison and to death!”

block.text: "Bikpela, mi stap redi long i go wantaim yu long kalabus. Na mi redi long i dai wantaim yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said,

block.text: Na Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I tell you, Peter, the rooster will by no means crow today until you deny that you know me three times.”

block.text: "Pita, mi tokim yu, nau long dispela nait, taim kakaruk i no krai yet, yu bai tok tripela taim olsem yu no save long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Jisas i tokim ol disaipel olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “When I sent you out without purse, and wallet, and shoes, did you lack anything?”

block.text: "Taim mi salim yupela i go mekim wok bilong mi, yupela i no bin karim ol paus mani na hanbek na su i go wantaim yupela. Na long dispela taim yupela i sot long wanpela samting, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said,

block.text: Na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Nothing.”

block.text: "Nogat."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he said to them,

block.text: Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “But now, whoever has a purse, let him take it, and likewise a wallet. Whoever has none, let him sell his cloak, and buy a sword.

block.text: "Tasol nau man i gat paus mani, em i mas kisim. Na tu, man i gat hanbek em i mas kisim. Na man i no gat bainat, em i mas salim saket bilong en na kisim mani na baim wanpela bainat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I tell you that this which is written must still be fulfilled in me: ‘He was counted with transgressors.’ For that which concerns me has an end.”

block.text: Long wanem, buk bilong God i gat tok olsem, 'Ol manmeri i bin lukim em olsem wanpela man nogut.' Mi tokim yupela, ol manmeri bai i mekim dispela pasin long mi. Long wanem, olgeta samting buk bilong God i tok bai i kamap long mi, em i mas kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said,

block.text: Na ol I tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, behold, here are two swords.”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu lukim. Mipela i gat tupela bainat i stap hia."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “That is enough.”

block.text: "Em inap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came out, and went, as his custom was, to the Mount of Olives. His disciples also followed him.

block.text: Orait Jisas i lusim taun na i go long maunten Oliv, olsem em i save mekim olgeta taim. Na ol disaipel i bihainim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he was at the place, he said to them,

block.text: Em i kamap long dispela hap na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Pray that you don’t enter into temptation.”

block.text: "Yupela i mas beten, bai traim i no ken kamap long yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He was withdrawn from them about a stone’s throw, and he knelt down and prayed,
saying,

block.text: Na em i lusim ol na i go longwe liklik, inap olsem mak bilong man i tromoi wanpela ston. Na em i brukim skru na i beten olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Father, if you are willing, remove this cup from me. Nevertheless, not my will, but yours, be done.”

block.text: "Papa, sapos yu laik, yu ken rausim dispela kap long mi. Tasol yu no ken bihainim laik bilong mi. Nogat. Yu mas bihainim laik bilong yu tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: An angel from heaven appeared to him, strengthening him.

block.text: Na wanpela ensel bilong heven i kam long em na i strongim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Being in agony he prayed more earnestly. His sweat became like great drops of blood falling down on the ground.

block.text: Jisas i pilim hevi nogut tru, na em i beten strong moa. Na tuhat bilong en i kamap olsem blut na i pundaun long graun. k

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he rose up from his prayer, he came to the disciples, and found them sleeping because of grief,
and said to them,

block.text: Em i beten pinis na em i sanap na i go long ol disaipel bilong en. Na em i lukim ol i slip i stap, long wanem, ol i bel hevi tumas.
Na em i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you sleep? Rise and pray that you may not enter into temptation.”

block.text: "Bilong wanem yupela i slip? Yupela kirap na beten. Nogut traim i kamap long yupela, na yupela i pundaun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: While he was still speaking, behold, a multitude, and he who was called Judas, one of the twelve, was leading them. He came near to Jesus to kiss him.
But Jesus said to him,

block.text: Jisas i toktok yet i stap, na bikpela lain man ol i kam. Dispela man ol i kolim Judas, em wanpela bilong ol 12 -pela disaipel, em i soim rot long ol. Em i kam klostu long Jisas bilong givim kis long em.
Tasol Jisas i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Judas, do you betray the Son of Man with a kiss?”

block.text: "Judas, yu laik givim kis long Pikinini Bilong Man na long dispela pasin yu ting long givim em long han bilong ol man, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: When those who were around him saw what was about to happen, they said to him,

block.text: Ol disaipel i stap wantaim Jisas ol i lukim samting i laik kamap, na ol i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, shall we strike with the sword?”

block.text: "Bikpela, yu laik bai mipela i kilim ol long bainat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: A certain one of them struck the servant of the high priest, and
cut off his right ear.
But Jesus answered,

block.text: Na wanpela bilong ol i kisim bainat na i paitim wokboi bilong hetpris, na bainat i
katim yau long han sut bilong dispela wokboi na yau i pundaun.
Tasol Jisas i lukim na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Permit them to seize me.”

block.text: "Lusim dispela pasin nau."

ReferenceBlocks.text: and he touched his ear, and healed him.

block.text: Na em i putim han long yau bilong dispela man, na yau i kamap gutpela gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to the chief priests, captains of the temple, and elders, who had come against him,

block.text: Na Jisas i mekim tok long ol bikpris na ol kepten bilong tempel na ol hetman, ol i kam bilong holimpas em. Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Have you come out as against a robber, with swords and clubs?

block.text: "Yupela i kisim ol bainat na stik, na yupela i kam olsem yupela i laik holimpas wanpela man bilong pait na stil, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: When I was with you in the temple daily, you didn’t stretch out your hands against me. But this is your hour, and the power of darkness.”

block.text: Olgeta de mi bin stap wantaim yupela insait long banis bilong tempel, tasol yupela i no putim han long mi. Tasol dispela taim nau em i taim bilong yupela. Nau strong bilong tudak em i win."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They seized him, and led him away, and brought him into the high priest’s house. But Peter followed from a distance.

block.text: Jisas i tok pinis, na ol i holimpas em na kisim em i go. Ol i bringim em i go insait long haus bilong hetpris. Na Pita i bihainim ol i go, tasol em i stap longwe liklik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they had kindled a fire in the middle of the courtyard, and had sat down together, Peter sat among them.

block.text: Sampela man i wokim paia insait long banis bilong dispela haus, na ol i sindaun. Na Pita i sindaun wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A certain servant girl saw him as he sat in the light, and looking intently at him, said,

block.text: Wanpela wokmeri i lukim em i sindaun i stap long paia. Na dispela wokmeri i lukluk long em na i tok,

block.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: servant girl at high priest's courtyard
ReferenceBlocks.text: “This man also was with him.”

block.text: "Dispela man tu em i bin i stap wantaim Jisas."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He denied Jesus, saying,

block.text: Tasol Pita i tok nogat olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woman, I don’t know him.”

block.text: "Meri, mi no save long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: After a little while someone else saw him, and said,

block.text: Bihain liklik narapela man i lukim em na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You also are one of them!”

block.text: "Yu tu yu man bilong lain bilong ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Peter answered,

block.text: Tasol Pita i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Man, I am not!”

block.text: "Nogat. Mi no disaipel bilong en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: After about one hour passed, another confidently affirmed, saying,

block.text: Samting olsem wan aua i go pinis, na narapela man i tok strong olsem,

block.characterId: high priest's servant (relative of the man whose ear Peter cut off)/those standing near

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: high priest's servant (relative of the man whose ear Peter cut off)/those standing near
ReferenceBlocks.characterIdOverrideForScript: high priest's servant (relative of the man whose ear Peter cut off)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Truly this man also was with him, for he is a Galilean!”

block.text: "Tru tumas, dispela man tu i bin i stap wantaim em. Em i man bilong Galili tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Peter said,

block.text: Tasol Pita i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Man, I don’t know what you are talking about!”

block.text: "Mi no save tru long dispela tok yu mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately, while he was still speaking, a rooster crowed.

block.text: Em i toktok yet, na wantu kakaruk i krai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Lord turned, and looked at Peter. Then Peter remembered the Lord’s word, how he said to him,

block.text: Na Bikpela i tanim na i lukluk long Pita. Na Pita i tingim gen dispela tok Bikpela i bin mekim. Bikpela i bin tokim Pita olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Before the rooster crows you will deny me three times.”

block.text: "Nau long dispela nait, taim kakaruk i no krai yet, yu bai tok tripela taim olsem yu no save long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went out, and wept bitterly.

block.text: Na Pita i go ausait na i krai nogut tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The men who held Jesus mocked him and beat him.

block.text: Ol man i holim Jisas ol i tok bilas long em na paitim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Having blindfolded him, they struck him on the face and asked him,

block.text: Ol i pasim ai bilong en long laplap na ol i askim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Prophesy! Who is the one who struck you?”

block.text: "Yu mekim tok profet nau. Dispela man i paitim yu, em husat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They spoke many other things against him, insulting him.

block.text: Na ol i mekim planti arapela tok nogut long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As soon as it was day, the assembly of the elders of the people was gathered together, both chief priests and scribes, and they led him away into their council, saying,

block.text: Taim san i kamap, ol hetman bilong ol manmeri i kam bung, na ol saveman bilong lo i bung wantaim ol. Na ol i kisim Jisas i go long kaunsil bilong ol, na ol i tok,

block.characterId: council of elders/chief priests/teachers of religious law

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: council of elders/chief priests/teachers of religious law
ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you are the Christ, tell us.”

block.text: "Yu tokim mipela, yu dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, o nogat?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he said to them,

block.text: Na em i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If I tell you, you won’t believe,
and if I ask, you will in no way answer me or let me go.

block.text: "Sapos mi tokim yupela, bai yupela i no bilip.
Na sapos mi askim yupela long sampela tok, bai yupela i no bekim tok bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: From now on, the Son of Man will be seated at the right hand of the power of God.”

block.text: Tasol nau na long olgeta taim bihain Pikinini Bilong Man bai i sindaun long han sut bilong God i gat bikpela strong."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They all said,

block.text: Na olgeta man i askim em,

block.characterId: council of elders/chief priests/teachers of religious law

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: council of elders/chief priests/teachers of religious law
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you then the Son of God?”

block.text: "Olsem na yu yet yu Pikinini Bilong God, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na em i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You say it, because I am.”

block.text: "Yupela yet i tok. Em mi tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said,

block.text: Na ol i tok,

block.characterId: council of elders/chief priests/teachers of religious law

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: council of elders/chief priests/teachers of religious law
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do we need any more witness? For we ourselves have heard from his own mouth!”

block.text: "Yumi no ken singautim ol man i kam bilong tokaut long pasin bilong dispela man. Maus bilong em yet i mekim dispela tok, na yumi harim pinis."

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE 23
The whole company of them rose up and brought him before Pilate.

block.text: Orait na olgeta bilong dispela ol bikman i kirap na i bringim Jisas i go long Pailat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They began to accuse him, saying,

block.text: Ol i stat long kotim em, na ol i tok olsem,

block.characterId: council of elders/chief priests/teachers of religious law

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: council of elders/chief priests/teachers of religious law
ReferenceBlocks.text: “We found this man perverting the nation, forbidding paying taxes to Caesar, and saying that he himself is Christ, a king.”

block.text: "Mipela i lukim dispela man i paulim pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong mipela. Em i tambuim mipela long givim takis long Sisar. Na em i save tok olsem em yet em dispela king God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate asked him,

block.text: Na Pailat i askim Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you the King of the Jews?”

block.text: "Yu king bilong ol Juda, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He answered him,

block.text: Na Jisas i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes… It is as you say.”

block.text: "Yu yet yu tok olsem."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate said to the chief priests and the multitudes,

block.text: Na Pailat i tokim ol bikpris na ol manmeri olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I find no basis for a charge against this man.”

block.text: "Mi no painim wanpela rong long dispela man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they insisted, saying,

block.text: Tasol ol i tok strong moa olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He stirs up the people, teaching throughout all Judea, beginning from Galilee even to this place.”

block.text: "Em i save go nabaut long olgeta hap bilong Judia, stat long distrik Galili na i kam inap long taun bilong yumi, na em i wok long skulim ol manmeri na kirapim bel bilong ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when Pilate heard Galilee mentioned, he asked:

block.text: Pailat i harim dispela tok na em i askim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Is this man a Galilean?”

block.text: "Dispela man em i man bilong Galili, a?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he found out that he was in Herod’s jurisdiction, he sent him to Herod, who was also in Jerusalem during those days.

block.text: Na taim Pailat i save olsem Jisas em i kam long hap graun Herot i bosim, em i salim Jisas i go long Herot. Long dispela taim Herot tu i stap long Jerusalem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now when Herod saw Jesus, he was exceedingly glad, for he had wanted to see him for a long time, because he had heard many things about him. He hoped to see some miracle done by him.

block.text: Herot i lukim Jisas, na em i amamas tumas. Em i bin harim tok long em, na longtaim tumas em i laik lukim em. Em i laik lukim Jisas i wokim wanpela mirakel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He questioned him with many words, but he gave no answers.

block.text: Olsem na Herot i askim Jisas long planti samting. Tasol Jisas i no bekim wanpela tok long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The chief priests and the scribes stood, vehemently accusing him.

block.text: Na ol bikpris na ol saveman bilong lo i kam sanap klostu na ol i kotim em strong tumas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Herod with his soldiers humiliated him and mocked him. Dressing him in luxurious clothing, they sent him back to Pilate.

block.text: Orait Herot wantaim ol soldia bilong en ol i rabisim Jisas, na ol i tok bilas long em. Ol i kisim wanpela naispela klos, na ol i pasim long em, na ol i salim em i go bek long Pailat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Herod and Pilate became friends with each other that very day, for before that they were enemies with each other.

block.text: Bipo Herot i save birua wantaim Pailat. Tasol nau long dispela taim tupela i kamap pren.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pilate called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people,
and said to them,

block.text: Orait Pailat i singautim ol bikpris na ol hetman na ol manmeri tu, na ol i kam bung.
Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You brought this man to me as one that perverts the people, and see, I have examined him before you, and found no basis for a charge against this man concerning those things of which you accuse him.

block.text: "Yupela i bin kisim dispela man i kam long mi, na yupela i tok, em i paulim pasin bilong ol manmeri. Na long taim yupela i stap, mi bin askim em gut long ol dispela samting. Orait harim. Mi no painim wanpela rong long dispela man. Mi no ting em i bin mekim wanpela bilong ol dispela samting yupela i kotim em long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Neither has Herod, for I sent you to him, and see, nothing worthy of death has been done by him.

block.text: Na Herot tu i gat wankain tingting, na em i salim dispela man i kam bek long yumi. Harim. Dispela man i no bin mekim wanpela rong inap long mi ken tok long em i mas i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will therefore chastise him and release him.”

block.text: I will therefore chastise him and release him.”

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now he had to release one prisoner to them at the feast.
But they all cried out together, saying,

block.text: Now he had to release one prisoner to them at the feast.
But they all cried out together, saying,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Away with this man! Release Barabbas to us!”

block.text: "Kilim dispela man i dai, na lusim Barabas i kam long mipela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: one who was thrown into prison for a certain revolt in the city, and for murder.

block.text: Barabas em wanpela man i bin kirapim pait long gavman insait long taun, na em i bin kilim man i dai, na ol i putim em long kalabus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then Pilate spoke to them again, saying:

block.text: Orait Pailat i mekim tok long ol gen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why not release Jesus?”

block.text: Em i laik lusim Jisas i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but they shouted, saying,

block.text: Tasol ol i singaut olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Crucify him! Crucify him!”

block.text: "Kilim em! Kilim em! Nilim em long diwai kros!"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them the third time,

block.text: Orait namba 3 taim em i tokim ol,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why? What evil has this man done? I have found no capital crime in him. I will therefore chastise him and release him.”

block.text: "Bilong wanem? Em i mekim wanem rong? Mi no painim wanpela rong long em inap long mi ken tok long em i mas i dai. Olsem na bai mi wipim em na lusim em i go."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they shouted all the more, saying:

block.text: Tasol ol i strong tumas, na ol i singaut strong moa long Pailat i mas

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Crucify him! Crucify him!”

block.text: nilim Jisas long diwai kros.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Their voices and the voices of the chief priests prevailed.
Pilate said:

block.text: Na singaut bilong ol em i daunim tok bilong Pailat.
Olsem na Pailat i bihainim tok bilong ol, na i tok long

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will do what you ask.”

block.text: Jisas i mas i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He released Barrabus, the prisoner they asked for. He had been thrown into prison for insurrection and murder. Then Pilate gave Jesus to them, saying:

block.text: Ol manmeri i singaut long Pailat i mas lusim dispela man i bin kirapim pait long gavman na kilim man i dai, na ol Rom i bin kalabusim em. Na Pailat i lusim em i go. Na Pailat i bihainim laik bilong ol na i givim Jisas long han bilong ol soldia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do what you want with him.”
When they led him away, they grabbed one Simon of Cyrene, coming from the country, and laid on him the cross, to carry it after Jesus.

block.text: Ol soldia i bringim Jisas i go, na ol i lukim wanpela man i wokabaut i kam na i laik i go insait long taun. Ol i holimpas dispela man, nem bilong en Saimon bilong taun Sairini. Na ol i putim diwai kros long sol bilong en, na ol i mekim em i karim i go bihainim Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A great multitude of the people followed him, including women who also mourned and lamented him.
But Jesus, turning to them, said,

block.text: Na bikpela lain manmeri ol i bihainim em, na planti meri ol i krai na singsing sori long em.
Tasol Jisas i tanim na i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Daughters of Jerusalem, don’t weep for me, but weep for yourselves and for your children.

block.text: "Yupela meri bilong Jerusalem, yupela i no ken krai long mi. Mobeta yupela i krai long yupela yet na long ol pikinini bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For behold, the days are coming in which they will say, ‘Blessed are the barren, the wombs that never bore, and the breasts that never nursed.’

block.text: Harim. Bihain wanpela taim bai i kamap na ol bai i tok olsem, 'Ol meri i no inap karim pikinini, na ol meri i no bin karim pikinini, na ol meri i no bin givim susu long pikinini, em ol i ken amamas.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they will begin to tell the mountains, ‘Fall on us!’ and tell the hills, ‘Cover us.’

block.text: Long dispela taim bai ol i tokim ol maunten olsem, 'Yupela karamapim mipela na haitim mipela.'

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if they do these things when the tree is green, what will happen when it is dry?”

block.text: Sapos nau ol i mekim dispela kain pasin long diwai i gat wara, orait ol bai i mekim wanem kain pasin long diwai i drai pinis?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: There were also others, two criminals, led with him to be put to death.

block.text: Ol soldia i bringim tupela arapela man tu, em tupela man i bin mekim pasin nogut. Ol i laik kilim i dai tupela wantaim Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they came to the place that is called The Skull, they crucified him there with the criminals, one on the right and the other on the left.
Jesus said,

block.text: Ol i go kamap long wanpela ples, nem bilong en Bun Bilong Het. Na long dispela ples ol i hangamapim Jisas long diwai kros. Na ol i hangamapim dispela tupela man nogut tu. Wanpela i stap long diwai kros i stap long han sut bilong Jisas, na wanpela long diwai kros i stap long han kais.
Na Jisas i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Father, forgive them, for they don’t know what they are doing.”

block.text: "Papa, yu ken lusim sin bilong ol. Ol i no save long dispela samting ol i mekim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Dividing his garments among them, they cast lots.

block.text: Na ol soldia i pilai satu bilong tilim ol klos samting bilong em long ol yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The people stood watching. The rulers with them also scoffed at him, saying,

block.text: Ol manmeri i sanap na i lukluk i stap, tasol ol hetman i tok bilas long Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He saved others. Let him save himself, if this is the Christ of God, his chosen one!”

block.text: "Em i bin helpim ol arapela man. Sapos i tru em i dispela man God i bin makim bilong mekim wok bilong en na bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, orait em i ken helpim em yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The soldiers also mocked him, coming to him and offering him vinegar,
and saying,

block.text: Ol soldia tu i tok bilas long em. Ol i kam klostu long em na ol i laik givim viniga long em.
Na ol i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you are the King of the Jews, save yourself!”

block.text: "Sapos i tru yu king bilong ol Juda, orait yu ken helpim yu yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: An inscription was also written over him in letters of Greek, Latin, and Hebrew: “THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS.”

block.text: Na ol i bin raitim wanpela tok na pasim long diwai kros antap long het bilong Jisas. Dispela tok i olsem, , "Dispela man em i King bilong ol Juda."

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of the criminals who was hanged insulted him, saying,

block.text: Wanpela bilong dispela tupela man nogut ol i bin hangamapim wantaim Jisas, em i tok bilas long Jisas olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If you are the Christ, save yourself and us!”

block.text: "Yu man God i makim, a? Orait yu helpim yu yet, na yu helpim mitupela wantaim."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the other answered, and rebuking him said,

block.text: Tasol arapela man i harim dispela tok na em i krosim namba wan man olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t you even fear God, seeing you are under the same condemnation?

block.text: "Yu tu yu kisim wankain hevi olsem dispela man, na yu no pret long God, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: And we indeed justly, for we receive the due reward for our deeds, but this man has done nothing wrong.”

block.text: Ol i kilim mitupela i dai, em ol i mekim stretpela pasin tasol. Mitupela i kisim hevi inap stret long ol pasin mitupela i bin mekim. Tasol dispela man hia em i no bin mekim wanpela rong."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to Jesus,

block.text: Na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Lord, remember me when you come into your Kingdom.”

block.text: "Jisas, taim yu kamap king, yu ken tingting long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus said to him,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Assuredly I tell you, today you will be with me in Paradise.”

block.text: "Mi tok tru long yu, nau bai yu stap wantaim mi long heven."

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was now about the sixth hour, and darkness came over the whole land until the ninth hour.

block.text: Nau em i olsem 12 klok. Na tudak i karamapim graun olgeta, i go inap long 3 klok long apinun,

ReferenceBlocks.text: The sun was darkened, and the veil of the temple was torn in two.

block.text: long wanem, lait bilong san i pinis long dispela taim. Na dispela bikpela laplap i hangamap i stap long tempel, em i bruk olgeta, na i kamap tupela hap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Jesus, crying with a loud voice, said,

block.text: Na Jisas i singaut strong moa olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Father, into your hands I commit my spirit!”

block.text: "Papa, mi putim spirit bilong mi long han bilong yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Having said this, he breathed his last.

block.text: Em i tok olsem, na em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the centurion saw what was done, he glorified God, saying,

block.text: Kepten bilong ol soldia em i lukim dispela samting, na em i litimapim nem bilong God. Na em i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Certainly this was a righteous man.”

block.text: "Tru tumas, dispela man em i stretpela man, na em i no bin mekim rong."

ReferenceBlocks.text: All the multitudes that came together to see this, when they saw the things that were done, returned home beating their breasts.

block.text: Na olgeta manmeri i bin kam bung bilong lukluk, ol i lukim ol samting i kamap, na ol i sori tru na paitim bros bilong ol, na ol i go bek long ol haus bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All his acquaintances, and the women who followed with him from Galilee, stood at a distance, watching these things.

block.text: Na olgeta pren bilong Jisas, wantaim ol meri i bin bihainim Jisas na lusim Galili na i kam, ol i sanap longwe liklik, na ol i lukim dispela olgeta samting i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, there was a man named Joseph, who was a member of the council, a good and righteous man.

block.text: Wanpela man i stap, nem bilong en Josep. Em i man bilong wanpela taun bilong ol Juda, ol i kolim Arimatea. Em i gutpela stretpela man, na em i wanpela bilong ol kaunsil.

ReferenceBlocks.text: (He had not consented to their counsel and deed). He was from Arimathaea, a city of the Jews, and he was also waiting for the Kingdom of God:

block.text: Tasol em i no bin orait long tingting na pasin bilong ol arapela kaunsil. Em i save wet long lukim kingdom bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This man went to Pilate, and asked for Jesus’ body.

block.text: Dispela man i go long Pailat na i askim em long larim em i kisim bodi bilong Jisas, na Pailat i tok orait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He took it down, and wrapped it in a linen cloth, and laid him in a tomb that was cut in stone, where no one had ever been laid.

block.text: Orait na em i kisim bodi bilong Jisas i kam daun, na i karamapim long waitpela laplap, na i kisim i go putim insait long wanpela matmat ol i no bin putim bodi bilong wanpela man long en bipo. Dispela matmat em wanpela hul bilong ston ol man i bin wokim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was the day of the Preparation, and the Sabbath was drawing near.

block.text: Dispela em i de bilong redim ol samting bilong de Sabat, na klostu de Sabat i laik kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The women, who had come with him out of Galilee, followed after, and saw the tomb, and how his body was laid.

block.text: Ol meri i bin lusim Galili na i kam wantaim Jisas, ol i bihainim Josep i go na ol i lukim dispela matmat. Na ol i lukim tu olsem wanem Josep i putim bodi bilong Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They returned, and prepared spices and ointments. On the Sabbath they rested according to the commandment.

block.text: Ol meri i lukim pinis, orait ol i go bek long haus bilong ol na ol i redim sampela kain marasin na wel samting i gat gutpela smel. Na long de Sabat ol i malolo olsem lo i tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: LUKE 24
But on the first day of the week, at early dawn, they and some others came to the tomb, bringing the spices which they had prepared.

block.text: Long namba wan de bilong wik, long moningtaim tru, ol meri i go long matmat. Ol i kisim dispela marasin samting i gat gutpela smel, ol i bin redim pinis, na ol i karim i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They found the stone rolled away from the tomb.

block.text: Na ol i lukim dispela ston ol man i bin pasim matmat long en em i no moa i stap long maus bilong matmat. Nogat. Ol i tantanim i go pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They entered in, and didn’t find the Lord Jesus’ body.

block.text: Na ol i go insait, tasol ol i no lukim bodi bilong Bikpela Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were greatly perplexed about this and said:

block.text: Ol i no save bodi bilong Jisas i stap we, na ol i tingting planti i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Where is his body?”
Suddenly, two men stood by them in dazzling clothing.
Becoming terrified, they bowed their faces down to the earth. They said to them,

block.text: Na ol i lukim tupela man i sanap klostu, klos bilong tupela i lait moa yet.
Orait na ol meri i pret tru na ol i daunim het na lukluk i go daun. Tasol dispela tupela man i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why do you seek the living among the dead?

block.text: "Bilong wanem yupela i kam painim man i gat laip long ples bilong ol man i dai pinis?

ReferenceBlocks.text: He isn’t here, but is risen. Remember what he told you when he was still in Galilee:

block.text: Em i no i stap hia. Em i kirap pinis. Yupela i mas tingim gen dispela tok em i bin givim yupela, taim em i stap yet long Galili.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said that the Son of Man must be delivered up into the hands of sinful men, and be crucified, and the third day rise again?”

block.text: Em i bin tokim yupela olsem, ol i mas givim Pikinini Bilong Man long han bilong ol man bilong mekim sin, na ol bai i nilim em long diwai kros. Na long de namba 3 bai em i kirap bek."

ReferenceBlocks.text: After hearing these words, the women said to each other:

block.text: Na ol i tingim dispela tok Jisas i mekim bipo,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you remember what he said?”

block.text: "Do you remember what He said?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They returned from the tomb and told all these things to the eleven, and to all the rest.

block.text: na ol i lusim matmat na ol i go bek. Na ol i tokim ol 11 -pela disaipel na olgeta arapela manmeri tu long dispela olgeta samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now they were Mary Magdalene, Joanna, and Mary the mother of James. The other women with them told these things to the apostles.

block.text: Ol meri i givim dispela tok long ol aposel, em Maria bilong taun Makdala na Joana na Maria, em mama bilong Jems, na ol arapela meri i stap wantaim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These words seemed to them to be nonsense, and they didn’t believe them.

block.text: Tasol ol aposel i ting ol meri i mekim tok win nating. Na ol i no bilipim tok bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But Peter got up and ran to the tomb. Stooping and looking in, he saw the strips of linen lying by themselves, and he departed to his home, wondering what had happened.

block.text: Tasol Pita i kirap na i ran i go long matmat. Na em i lindaun na i lukluk i go insait, na em i lukim ol laplap tasol i stap. Orait em i go bek long haus na em i tingting planti long dispela samting i bin kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, two of them were going that very day to a village named Emmaus, which was sixty stadia from Jerusalem.

block.text: Long dispela de tasol ol meri i bin i go long matmat, tupela disaipel i wokabaut i go long wanpela ples ol i kolim Emeus. Dispela ples i stap longwe long Jerusalem inap olsem 11 -pela kilomita.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They talked with each other about all of these things which had happened.

block.text: Tupela i wokabaut i go, na tupela i wok long toktok long dispela olgeta samting i bin kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, while they talked and questioned together, that Jesus himself came near, and went with them.

block.text: Tupela i wok long mekim planti toktok na askim long ol dispela samting, na Jisas yet i kamap klostu na i wokabaut i go wantaim tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But their eyes were kept from recognizing him.
He said to them,

block.text: Tasol wanpela samting i pasim ai bilong tupela, na tupela i no luksave olsem, em i Jisas.
Na em i askim tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What are you talking about as you walk?”

block.text: "Yutupela i toktok long wanem samting na yutupela i wokabaut i go?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were very sad.
One of them, named Cleopas, answered him,

block.text: Em i tok olsem, na tupela i sanap na pes bilong tupela i soim olsem tupela i bel sori tru.
Na wanpela bilong tupela, em wanpela man nem bilong en Kliopas, em i bekim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Are you the only stranger in Jerusalem who doesn’t know the things which have happened there in these days?”

block.text: "Planti man bilong ol narapela narapela ples nau ol i stap long Jerusalem. Na ating yu wanpela tasol yu no save long ol samting i bin kamap long Jerusalem long dispela taim?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Em i tok olsem, na Jisas i askim tupela,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “What things?”

block.text: "Wanem samting?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said to him,

block.text: Na tupela i tokim em olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The things concerning Jesus, the Nazarene, who was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people;

block.text: "Mipela i tok long dispela ol samting i bin kamap long Jisas bilong Nasaret. Em i wanpela profet, na em i save mekim strongpela wok na strongpela tok long ai bilong God na long ai bilong ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The chief priests and our rulers delivered him up to be condemned to death, and they crucified him.

block.text: Na ol bikpris na ol hetman bilong yumi ol i putim em long han bilong gavman. Na gavman i pasim tok long kilim em i dai, na ol i nilim em long diwai kros.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we were hoping that it was he who would redeem Israel. Yes, and besides all this, it is now the third day since these things happened.

block.text: Pastaim mipela i bin bilip olsem, Jisas em dispela man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong Israel. ``Na i gat wanpela tok moa tu. Ol dispela samting i kamap, na nau em i namba 3 de bihain long ol i bin kilim em i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Also, certain women of our company amazed us, having arrived early at the tomb.

block.text: Na nau sampela meri bilong lain bilong mipela ol i mekim mipela i kirap nogut tru. Long moningtaim tru ol i go long matmat,

ReferenceBlocks.text: And when they didn’t find his body, they came saying that they had also seen a vision of angels, who said that he was alive.

block.text: na ol i no lukim bodi bilong Jisas i stap. Na ol i kam bek, na ol i tok olsem, 'Mipela i lukim ol ensel, na ol i tok, "Em i stap laip.'"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Some of us went to the tomb, and found it just like the women had said, but they didn’t see him.”

block.text: Na sampela bilong ol lain bilong mipela ol i go long matmat, na ol i lukim ol samting i stap olsem ol meri i bin tok. Tasol ol i no lukim em yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said to them,

block.text: Na Jisas i tokim tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Foolish men, and slow of heart to believe in all that the prophets have spoken!

block.text: "Yutupela i no gat tingting na bel bilong yutupela i no kirap kwik long bilipim olgeta tok ol profet i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Didn’t the Christ have to suffer these things and to enter into his glory?”

block.text: Olsem wanem? Ating yutupela i no save, dispela man God i bin promis long salim i kam bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, em i mas karim pen pastaim na bihain em bai i kisim bikpela namba tru long God?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: Beginning from Moses and from all the prophets, he explained to them in all the Scriptures the things concerning himself.

block.text: Na em i autim tok long tupela. Em i stat long tok bilong Moses na bilong olgeta profet, na em i skulim tupela long as bilong olgeta hap bilong buk bilong God i toktok long em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They drew near to the village, where they were going, and he acted like he would go further.
They urged him, saying,

block.text: Ol i wokabaut i go na ol i kamap klostu long dispela ples tupela i laik i stap long en. Na Jisas i mekim olsem em i laik i go moa.
Tasol tupela i pasim em na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Stay with us, for it is almost evening, and the day is almost over.”

block.text: "Yu stap wantaim mitupela. San i laik i go daun nau, na liklik taim bai tudak i kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He went in to stay with them.

block.text: Olsem na em i go insait long haus na i stap wantaim tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, that when he had sat down at the table with them, he took the bread and gave thanks. Breaking it, he gave to them.

block.text: Bihain ol i laik kaikai, na Jisas i sindaun wantaim tupela. Na em i kisim bret na i tenkyu long God, na i brukim, na i givim long tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then, their eyes were opened and they recognized him, and he vanished out of their sight.

block.text: Em i mekim olsem, na ai bilong tupela i op, na tupela i luksave long em. Na wantu em i lus nating, na tupela i no lukim em moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They said one to another,

block.text: Na tupela i toktok long tupela yet olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Weren’t our hearts burning within us, while he spoke to us along the way, and while he opened the Scriptures to us?”

block.text: "Tru tumas, taim mitupela i wokabaut long rot, na em i givim toktok long mitupela, na em i autim as tingting bilong buk bilong God long mitupela, bel bilong mitupela i bin kirap tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: They rose up that very hour, returned to Jerusalem, and found the eleven gathered together, and those who were with them,
saying,

block.text: Tupela i tok olsem, na wantu tupela i kirap na i go bek long Jerusalem. Na tupela i lukim ol 11 -pela disaipel wantaim sampela pren bilong ol, ol i bung i stap.
Na ol i tokim tupela olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Lord is risen indeed, and has appeared to Simon!”

block.text: "Tru tumas, Bikpela i kirap bek! Saimon i lukim em pinis!"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They related the things that happened along the way, and how he was recognized by them in the breaking of the bread.

block.text: Orait na tupela i stori long ol long olgeta samting i bin kamap long tupela long rot. Na tupela i tok, "Taim em i brukim bret, mitupela i bin luksave long em."

ReferenceBlocks.text: As they said these things, Jesus himself stood among them, and said to them,

block.text: Ol disaipel i toktok yet i stap, na Jisas yet i sanap namel long ol. Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Peace be to you.”

block.text: "Bel bilong yupela i ken i stap isi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they were terrified and filled with fear, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.
He said to them,

block.text: Tasol ol i kirap nogut na ol i pret. Ol i ting ol i lukim wanpela tewel.
Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Why are you troubled? Why do doubts arise in your hearts?

block.text: "Bilong wanem yupela i kirap nogut? Bilong wanem yupela i tingting planti?

ReferenceBlocks.text: See my hands and my feet, that it is truly me. Touch me and see, for a spirit doesn’t have flesh and bones, as you see that I have.”

block.text: Lukim han na lek bilong mi. Mi yet mi stap. Holim skin bilong mi, na lukim. Ol tewel i no gat mit na bun olsem yupela i lukim i stap long mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had said this, he showed them his hands and his feet.

block.text: Em i tok olsem, na em i soim han wantaim lek bilong en long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: While they still didn’t believe for joy, and wondered, he said to them,

block.text: Ol i amamas tru, tasol ol i no bilip yet. Na ol i tingting planti. Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Do you have anything here to eat?”

block.text: "Ating yupela i gat sampela kaikai i stap hia?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: They gave him a piece of a broiled fish and some honeycomb.

block.text: Na ol i givim em hap pis ol i bin kukim,

ReferenceBlocks.text: He took them, and ate in front of them.
He said to them,

block.text: na em i kisim na kaikai, na ol i lukim.
Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This is what I told you, while I was still with you, that all things which are written in the law of Moses, the prophets, and the psalms, concerning me must be fulfilled.”

block.text: "Taim mi stap yet wantaim yupela, mi bin tokim yupela pinis olsem, olgeta samting bipo ol i raitim long mi long lo bilong Moses na long buk bilong ol profet na long Buk Song, dispela olgeta samting i mas kamap tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he opened their minds, that they might understand the Scriptures.
He said to them,

block.text: Na em i helpim ol long tingting gut long as bilong ol tok i stap long buk bilong God.
Na em i tokim ol olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Thus it is written: The Christ will suffer and will rise from the dead the third day.

block.text: "Buk bilong God i gat tok olsem, man God i makim bilong kisim bek ol manmeri bilong en, em i mas karim pen, na long de namba 3 em i mas kirap bek long matmat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And repentance and the remission of sins will be preached in his name to all the nations, beginning at Jerusalem.

block.text: Na long nem bilong em bai ol i mas autim tok long olgeta lain manmeri, bai ol i ken tanim bel, na bai God i lusim ol sin bilong ol. Yupela i mas statim dispela wok long Jerusalem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are witnesses of these things.

block.text: na yupela i mas autim tok long ol dispela samting i bin kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, I send forth what my Father has promised you. But wait in the city of Jerusalem until you are clothed with power from on high.”

block.text: Harim. Bipo Papa i bin promis long givim Holi Spirit long yupela, na klostu bai mi salim i kam long yupela. Yupela i mas i stap long dispela taun inap long taim yupela i kisim dispela strong bilong God."

ReferenceBlocks.text: He led them out as far as Bethany, and he lifted up his hands, and blessed them.

block.text: Orait Jisas i bringim ol disaipel i go inap long ples Betani. Na em i litimapim han bilong en na i askim God long mekim gut long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It happened, while he blessed them, that he withdrew from them, and was carried up into heaven.

block.text: Em i givim blesing yet long ol, na em i lusim ol, na God i kisim em i go long heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They worshiped him, and returned to Jerusalem with great joy.

block.text: Na ol i brukim skru na lotu long em. Na ol i amamas tru na ol i go bek long Jerusalem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were continually in the temple, praising and blessing God. Amen.

block.text: Na oltaim ol i stap long tempel na ol i litimapim nem bilong God.
